original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang yang dag par ldan pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang yang dag par ldan pa'o //
translated: and up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi rnams dang / dbang po lnga rnams dang / stobs lnga rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams dang yang dag par ldan pa'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi rnams dang / dbang po lnga rnams dang / stobs lnga rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams dang yang dag par ldan pa'o //
translated: He is endowed with the four applications of mindfulness, the four right efforts, the four legs of miraculous power, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, and the noble eightfold path.

original: rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni bsam gtan bzhi rnams dang / tshad med pa bzhi rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni bsam gtan bzhi rnams dang / tshad med pa bzhi rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams dang /
translated: Subhūti, this deep perfection of wisdom is endowed with the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, the four formless absorptions, the four noble truths, the eight deliverances, the nine serial absorptions,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa drug rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang yang dag par ldan pa'o //🔽rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang yang dag par ldan pa'o //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa drug rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang yang dag par ldan pa'o // rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang yang dag par ldan pa'o //
translated: the nine serial absorptions, emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness, the six clairvoyances, the meditative stabilizations, the dhāraṇī gateways, and the ten powers of the tathāgatas.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams dang yang dag par ldan pa'o //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams dang yang dag par ldan pa'o //
translated: Subhūti, this perfection of wisdom is endowed with the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos @232a * //🔽dang yang dag par ldan pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos @232a * // dang yang dag par ldan pa'o //
translated: Subhūti, this perfection of wisdom is endowed with the buddhadharmas.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang yang dag par ldan pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang yang dag par ldan pa'o //
translated: It is endowed with the knowledge of all aspects up to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /🔽rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba yul 'khor thob pa'i rgyal po'i bya bar gyur pa gang dang gang yin pa de dag thams cad blon po dang ldan na rgyal po'i bya ba'am /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na / rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba yul 'khor thob pa'i rgyal po'i bya bar gyur pa gang dang gang yin pa de dag thams cad blon po dang ldan na rgyal po'i bya ba'am /
translated: It is just as, Subhuti,

original: yul 'khor gyi bya ba la rgyal po snying las chung zhing khur bor bar gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: yul 'khor gyi bya ba la rgyal po snying las chung zhing khur bor bar gyur ba yin no //
translated: when a king, a Chakravartin, has obtained his realm, all the work of the king and of the realm is done by his ministers, and the king is at ease and free from cares.

original: rab 'byor de bzhin du nyan thos kyi chos sam /
analyzed: rab 'byor de bzhin du nyan thos kyi chos sam /
translated: In the same way, Subhuti, all the dharmas of the Disciples,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam /
translated: all the dharmas of the Pratyekabuddhas,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam /
translated: all the dharmas of the Bodhisattvas,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos gang ci yang rung ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos gang ci yang rung ste /
translated: all the dharmas of the Buddhas,

original: de dag thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang yang dag par ldan na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de dag gi bya ba byed do //
analyzed: de dag thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang yang dag par ldan na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de dag gi bya ba byed do //
translated: when they are associated with the perfection of wisdom, are done by the perfection of wisdom.

original: rab 'byor de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba chen pos nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba chen pos nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: Therefore, Subhuti, the perfection of wisdom is occupied with the great work.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas dang / bya ba mi mnyam pas dang / bya ba gzhal du med pas dang / bya ba grangs med pas dang / bya ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas dang / bya ba mi mnyam pas dang / bya ba gzhal du med pas dang / bya ba grangs med pas dang / bya ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: This perfection of wisdom is present with an inconceivable performance, with a performance that is not equal, with a performance that is immeasurable, with a performance that is innumerable, with a performance that is equal to the unequalled.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni gzugs kyi yongs su ma bzung ba dang / mngon par ma zhen pas nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni gzugs kyi yongs su ma bzung ba dang / mngon par ma zhen pas nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: Subhūti, it is because this deep perfection of wisdom is present with the nonapprehending and nonadherence of form.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i yongs su ma bzung ba dang / mngon par ma zhen pas nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i yongs su ma bzung ba dang / mngon par ma zhen pas nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: It is present with the nonapprehending and nonadherence of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi yongs su ma bzung ba dang / mngon par ma zhen pas nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi yongs su ma bzung ba dang / mngon par ma zhen pas nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: It is present with the nonapprehending and nonadherence of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i yongs su ma bzung ba dang / mngon par ma zhen pas nye bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i yongs su ma bzung ba dang / mngon par ma zhen pas nye bar gnas pa'o //
translated: and the fruit of stream-enterer, and the fruit of once-returner, and the fruit of non-returner, and the fruit of a worthy one, and a pratyekabuddha’s awakening, and unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar gyi yongs su ma bzung ba dang /🔽mngon par ma zhen pas nye bar gnas so //
analyzed: de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar gyi yongs su ma bzung ba dang / mngon par ma zhen pas nye bar gnas so //
translated: “Subhūti, this perfection of wisdom is not appropriated and does not settle down on the form of the past,

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzugs kyi yongs su ma bzung ba dang / mngon par ma zhen pas nye bar gnas pa lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzugs kyi yongs su ma bzung ba dang / mngon par ma zhen pas nye bar gnas pa lags /
translated: “Lord, how is this perfection of wisdom not appropriated and does not settle down on the form of the past,

original: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams @232b dang ; rnam par shes pa'i yongs su ma bzung ba dang / mngon par ma zhen pas nye bar gnas pa lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams @232b dang ; rnam par shes pa'i yongs su ma bzung ba dang / mngon par ma zhen pas nye bar gnas pa lags /
translated: “Lord, how is it that feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are not appropriated and do not obsess?”

original: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar gyi yongs su ma bzung ba dang / mngon par ma zhen pas nye bar gnas pa lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar gyi yongs su ma bzung ba dang / mngon par ma zhen pas nye bar gnas pa lags /
translated: “Lord, how is it that up to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening is not appropriated and does not obsess?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor khyod kyis gzugs gang yongs su gzung bar bya ba'am /
analyzed: rab 'byor khyod kyis gzugs gang yongs su gzung bar bya ba'am /
translated: “Subhūti, do you see that form that is to be appropriated or

original: mngon par zhen par bya ba de lta bu yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam /
analyzed: mngon par zhen par bya ba de lta bu yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam /
translated: that is to be obsessed with?”

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so //
translated: “Lord, I do not.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,🔽“Subhūti, do you see that feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness that is to be appropriated or🔽that is to be obsessed with?”

analyzed: rab 'byor khyod kyis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung bar bya ba'am /
translated: Subhūti, do you see any such form that you should grasp or🔽become fixated on?🔽Subhūti, do you see any such feeling, perception, volitional factors, or

original: mngon par zhen par bya ba de lta bu yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam /
analyzed: mngon par zhen par bya ba de lta bu yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam /

original: rab 'byor khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar gang yongs su gzung bar bya ba'am /
analyzed: rab 'byor khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar gang yongs su gzung bar bya ba'am /
translated: Subhūti, do you see any such unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening

original: mngon par zhen par bya ba de lta bu yang dag par rjes su gzung ngam /
analyzed: mngon par zhen par bya ba de lta bu yang dag par rjes su gzung ngam /
translated: that you should grasp or become fixated on?

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so //
translated: “No, Bhagavān.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Bhagavān said,

original: rab 'byor legs so legs so //🔽rab 'byor ngas kyang gang yongs su gzung bar bya ba'am /🔽mngon par zhen par bya ba'i gzugs de lta bu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: rab 'byor legs so legs so // rab 'byor ngas kyang gang yongs su gzung bar bya ba'am / mngon par zhen par bya ba'i gzugs de lta bu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: “Excellent, Subhūti, excellent!🔽Subhūti, I also do not see any such form that you should grasp or🔽become fixated on.

original: rab 'byor ngas kyang gang yongs su gzung bar bya ba'am /
analyzed: rab 'byor ngas kyang gang yongs su gzung bar bya ba'am /
translated: Subhūti, I also do not see any such feeling, perception, volitional factors, or🔽consciousness that you should grasp or become fixated on.

original: mngon par zhen par bya ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: mngon par zhen par bya ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not see feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness that can be grasped.

original: rab 'byor ngas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: rab 'byor ngas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: “Subhūti, I also do not see unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas yongs su ma bzung /
translated: Because I do not see it, I do not grasp it.

original: yongs su ma bzung bas mngon par ma zhen to //
analyzed: yongs su ma bzung bas mngon par ma zhen to //
translated: Because I do not grasp it, I do not settle down on it.

original: rab 'byor ngas kyang sangs rgyas nyid dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: rab 'byor ngas kyang sangs rgyas nyid dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: “Subhūti, I also do not see buddhahood, the knowledge of all aspects, the state of omniscience, or the tathāgata.

original: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas yongs su ma bzung /
translated: Because I do not see it, I do not grasp it.

original: yongs su ma bzung bas mngon par ma zhen to //
analyzed: yongs su ma bzung bas mngon par ma zhen to //
translated: Because I do not grasp it, I do not settle down on it.

original: rab 'byor de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gzugs yongs su gzung bar mi bya /
analyzed: rab 'byor de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gzugs yongs su gzung bar mi bya /
translated: “Subhūti, therefore bodhisattva great beings should not grasp form.

original: mngon par zhen par mi bya'o //🔽rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' @233a * //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bya'o // rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' @233a * //
translated: They should not grasp at them and should not settle down on them.🔽Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings should not grasp at or settle down on feelings, perceptions, formative predispositions, or consciousness.

original: chen pos tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung bar mi bya /🔽mngon par zhen par mi bya'o //
analyzed: chen pos tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung bar mi bya / mngon par zhen par mi bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings should not grasp at or settle down on the eyes, ears, nose, tongue, body, or mental faculty.🔽Similarly, they should not grasp at or settle down on the sensory element of the eyes, the sensory element of sights, and the sensory element of visual consciousness;

original: de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag rnams yongs su gzung bar mi bya /
analyzed: de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag rnams yongs su gzung bar mi bya /
translated: they should not grasp at or settle down on the sensory element of the ears, the sensory element of sounds, and the sensory element of auditory consciousness;

original: mngon par zhen par mi bya'o //🔽de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bya'o //🔽de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /
translated: they should not grasp at or settle down on the sensory element of the nose, the sensory element of smells, and the sensory element of olfactory consciousness;🔽they should not grasp at or settle down on the sensory element of the tongue, the sensory element of tastes, and the sensory element of gustatory consciousness;🔽they should not grasp at or settle down on the sensory element of the body, the sensory element of tangibles, and the sensory element of tactile consciousness;🔽they should not grasp at or settle down on the sensory element of the mental faculty, the sensory element of mental phenomena, and the sensory element of mental consciousness.

original: tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
translated: the immeasurables, the dhyānas, the formless absorptions, the eight liberations, the nine serial absorptions, emptiness, signlessness,

original: smon pa med pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams yongs su gzung bar mi bya /🔽mngon par zhen par mi bya'o //🔽bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar yongs su gzung bar mi bya /
analyzed: smon pa med pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams yongs su gzung bar mi bya / mngon par zhen par mi bya'o // bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar yongs su gzung bar mi bya /
translated: wishlessness, the clairvoyances, the ten tathāgata powers, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha should not be grasped and should not be taken up.

original: mngon par zhen par mi bya'o //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bya'o //
translated: Up to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening should not be grasped and should not be taken up.

original: de bzhin du sangs rgyas nyid dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yongs su gzung bar mi bya /
analyzed: de bzhin du sangs rgyas nyid dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yongs su gzung bar mi bya /
translated: omniscience, the knowledge of all modes, and the Tathāgata.

original: mngon par zhen par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad sdud pa'i khyad par kun 'byung gi skad cig ma dang po yin no //
analyzed: mngon par zhen par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad sdud pa'i khyad par kun 'byung gi skad cig ma dang po yin no //
translated: This is the first moment of the origin of the special inclusion of all noble persons.

original: de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the sons of gods of the desire realm and the sons of gods of the form realm said this to the Lord:

original: bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab cing blta dka' la rtogs par dka' ba brtag tu ma mchis pa rtog ge'i spyod yul ma lags pa ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab cing blta dka' la rtogs par dka' ba brtag tu ma mchis pa rtog ge'i spyod yul ma lags pa ste /
translated: “Lord, the perfection of wisdom is deep, hard to see, hard to understand, not something for a logical argument,

original: bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zhi ba /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zhi ba /
translated: Lord, the perfection of wisdom is peaceful,

original: phra ba / mdzangs pa /
analyzed: phra ba / mdzangs pa /
translated: subtle,

original: mkhas pa / rnam par shes pas rig par bgyi ba ste /
analyzed: mkhas pa / rnam par shes pas rig par bgyi ba ste /
translated: and can be known by the wise, by those with knowledge.

original: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ba de dag ni nges par sngon gyi rgyal ba la bgyi ba bgyis pa lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ba de dag ni nges par sngon gyi rgyal ba la bgyi ba bgyis pa lags /
translated: Blessed One, those bodhisattvas who will believe in this profound perfection of wisdom have certainly served the victors of the past.

original: @233b bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ba 'di dag ni nges par dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba'o //
analyzed: @233b bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ba 'di dag ni nges par dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba'o //
translated: Blessed One, those bodhisattvas who will believe in this profound perfection of wisdom have certainly been accepted by a spiritual friend.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o zhes bya ba ni skyes bu mkhas pas rig par bya ba nyid kyi khyad par kun 'byung gi skad cig ma gnyis pa yin no //
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o zhes bya ba ni skyes bu mkhas pas rig par bya ba nyid kyi khyad par kun 'byung gi skad cig ma gnyis pa yin no //
translated: They have planted the roots of virtue. This is the second moment of origination, the distinctive feature of being recognized by the wise.

original: bcom ldan 'das gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dad pa'i rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dad pa'i rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur /
translated: Blessed One, if all the sentient beings in the great billionfold world system were to become followers of faith,

original: chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom par 'gyur /
analyzed: chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom par 'gyur /
translated: They will become stream enterers, once-returners, non-returners, and arhats.

original: rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur te /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur te /
translated: They will become pratyekabuddhas.🔽All their knowledge and relinquishment, and their acceptance, belief, reflection, investigation,

original: de dag thams cad kyi shes pa dang spangs pa gang ji snyed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la gdugs gcig tu bzod cing mos pa dang / bsam pa dang / gzhal ba dang / nye bar bstan pa dang /
analyzed: de dag thams cad kyi shes pa dang spangs pa gang ji snyed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la gdugs gcig tu bzod cing mos pa dang / bsam pa dang / gzhal ba dang / nye bar bstan pa dang /
translated: and demonstration of this profound transcendent perfection of wisdom for a single day,

original: bgrang ba'i tshul de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bzod cing mos na 'di nyid de dag las mchog dang gtso bor khums lags so //
analyzed: bgrang ba'i tshul de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bzod cing mos na 'di nyid de dag las mchog dang gtso bor khums lags so //
translated: if they know the transcendent perfection of wisdom and have acceptance and belief in it, this is superior to all of those.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: de ni 'di ltar dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang ;
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang ;
translated: It is the acceptance of those who follow by faith, those who follow by doctrinal teachings, those who are at the eighth stage, those who are stream-enterers, those who are once-returners, those who are nonreturners, those who are arhats,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa dang / spong ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod pa'o //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa dang / spong ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod pa'o //
translated: and the knowledge and abandonment of pratyekabuddhas.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de dag la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de dag la bka' stsal pa /
translated: Then the Lord said to those gods:

original: lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no //
analyzed: lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no //
translated: “Gods, it is so!

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: It is just as you have said!

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi bar gyi shes pa dang / spangs pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod pa'o zhes bya ba ni thun mong ma yin pa'i khyad par te kun 'byung gi skad cig ma gsum pa yin no //🔽lha'i bu dag rigs kyi bu'am /🔽rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan cing thos nas bri ba dang / bris nas lung 'bogs pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi bar gyi shes pa dang / spangs pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod pa'o zhes bya ba ni thun mong ma yin pa'i khyad par te kun 'byung gi skad cig ma gsum pa yin no // lha'i bu dag rigs kyi bu'am / rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan cing thos nas bri ba dang / bris nas lung 'bogs pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: This is the uncommon distinction, the third moment of the origin.

original: rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shin tu myur bar mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod par bya'i /🔽nyan thos kyi theg pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams dang / @234a * //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shin tu myur bar mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod par bya'i / nyan thos kyi theg pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams dang / @234a * //
translated: Devas, any son of a good family or daughter of a good family who listens to this profound perfection of wisdom, and having listened, writes it out, and having written it out, recites it, and having recited it, properly pays attention to it, those sons of a good family or daughters of a good family should be known to desire nirvāṇa very quickly.🔽Not those who practice in the śrāvaka vehicle, the pratyekabuddha vehicle,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba'i mdo sde gzhan la spyod pa dag ni ma yin no //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba'i mdo sde gzhan la spyod pa dag ni ma yin no //
translated: and other sūtras devoid of the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las phul du byung ba'i chos gang la dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / brgyad pas bslab par bya ba dang / gang la rgyun du zhugs pa dang /🔽lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bslab par bya ba dang / gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis bslab par bya ba dang /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las phul du byung ba'i chos gang la dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / brgyad pas bslab par bya ba dang / gang la rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bslab par bya ba dang / gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis bslab par bya ba dang /
translated: Why is that?🔽It is because in this profound perfection of wisdom are taught the special dharmas that are to be trained in by those who follow faith, by those who follow the dharma, by those who have entered the stream,🔽by those who are tied to one more rebirth, by those who will no longer be subject to rebirth, by arhats, by pratyekabuddhas, and by bodhisattva great beings who have set out in the Great Vehicle.🔽

original: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bslabs te /
analyzed: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bslabs te /
translated: If you ask why, it is because in this deep perfection of wisdom the dharmas that are the foremost, the dharmas that are the best, the dharmas that are the most excellent, the dharmas that are sublime, the dharmas that are unsurpassed, the dharmas that are unequalled, the dharmas that are not equal, the dharmas that are not at all like anything, the dharmas that are not mixed up with anything, the dharmas that are not defiled, the dharmas that are not subject to affliction, the dharmas that are not subject to purification, the dharmas that are not subject to rebirth, the dharmas that are not subject to nirvāṇa, the dharmas that are not subject to the uncompounded, the dharmas that are not subject to the compounded, the dharmas that are not subject to the conditioned, the dharmas that are not subject to the unconditioned, the dharmas that are not subject to the past, the future, or the present, the dharmas that are not subject to the world system of desire, the world system of form, or the world system of formlessness, the dharmas that are not subject to the world system of the śrāvakas, the world system of the pratyekabuddhas, or the world system of the buddhas, the dharmas that are not subject to the world system of the śrāvakas, the pratyekabuddhas, or the buddhas, the dharmas that are not subject to the world system of the śrāvakas, the pratyekabuddhas, the bodhisattvas, or the buddhas, the dharmas that are not subject to the world system of the śrāvakas, the pratyekabuddhas, the bodhisattvas, or the buddhas, the dharmas that are not subject to the world system of the śrāvakas, the pratyekabuddhas, the bodhisattvas, or the buddhas, the dharmas that are not subject to the world system of the śrāvakas, the pratyekabuddhas, the bodhisattvas, or the buddhas, the dharmas that are not subject to the world system of the śrāvakas, the pratyekabuddhas

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa de dag rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni mngon par shes pa myur ba'i khyad par kun 'byung gi skad cig ma bzhi ba yin no
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa de dag rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni mngon par shes pa myur ba'i khyad par kun 'byung gi skad cig ma bzhi ba yin no
translated: This is the fourth moment of the origin.

original: // de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis ched du brjod pa ched du brjod de /
analyzed: // de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis ched du brjod pa ched du brjod de /
translated: Then the gods of the desire realm and the gods of the form realm exclaimed:

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste /
translated: “Blessed One, it is like this:

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen po ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen po ste /
translated: this perfection of wisdom is a great perfection.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste /
translated: Blessed One, it is like this:

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: this perfection of wisdom is an inconceivable perfection.

original: mi mnyam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //🔽tshad ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: mi mnyam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o // tshad ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: It is an unequalled perfection.🔽It is an immeasurable perfection.

original: gzhal du ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: gzhal du ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: It is an incomparable perfection.

original: grangs ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: grangs ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: “It is the perfection of the countless.

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: “It is the perfection of the equal to the unequaled.

original: bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo gang la bslabs shing dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams 'byung bar 'gyur /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo gang la bslabs shing dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams 'byung bar 'gyur /
translated: “Blessed One, having trained in the profound perfection of wisdom, those who follow by faith appear.

original: chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams 'byung bar 'gyur /
analyzed: chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams 'byung bar 'gyur /
translated: Those who follow the Dharma, the eighth, the stream enterers, the once-returners, the nonreturners, the arhats, and the pratyekabuddhas appear.

original: gang la bslabs shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas /
analyzed: gang la bslabs shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas /
translated: Having trained in it, the bodhisattva great beings have fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo @234b 'di 'grib pa'am /
analyzed: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo @234b 'di 'grib pa'am /
translated: They will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, but they will not see this profound perfection of wisdom as decreasing or increasing.”

original: 'phel bar yang 'tshal bar mi gda'o zhes bya ba ni 'grib pa dang 'phel ba med pa'i khyad par te /
analyzed: 'phel bar yang 'tshal bar mi gda'o zhes bya ba ni 'grib pa dang 'phel ba med pa'i khyad par te /
translated: This is the distinction of non-decrease and non-increase.

original: 'gog pa'i skad cig ma dang po yin no //
analyzed: 'gog pa'i skad cig ma dang po yin no //
translated: This is the first moment of cessation.

original: de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te /
analyzed: de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te /
translated: Then those sons of gods who live in the desire realm and those who live in the form realm bowed their heads to the two feet of the Lord,

original: bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du g-yas phyogs su bskor nas /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du g-yas phyogs su bskor nas /
translated: circumambulated the Lord three times to the right,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ste /
translated: and departed from the Lord’s presence.

original: de nas shin tu yang mi ring ba zhig tu phyin nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu gang yin pa de dag ni 'dod pa'i khams su 'khod do //
analyzed: de nas shin tu yang mi ring ba zhig tu phyin nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu gang yin pa de dag ni 'dod pa'i khams su 'khod do //
translated: Then, having gone not very far, those sons of gods who live in the desire realm took their places in the desire realm,🔽and those sons of gods who live in the form realm took their places in the form realm.

original: gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu gang yin pa de dag ni gzugs kyi khams su 'khod do //
analyzed: gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu gang yin pa de dag ni gzugs kyi khams su 'khod do //
translated: The sons of gods who were in the form realm took their places in the form realm.

original: de nas te dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas te dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the one endowed with auspicious signs, Subhūti, said this to the Lord:

original: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos par 'gyur ba de dag gang nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes par gyur pa lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos par 'gyur ba de dag gang nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes par gyur pa lags /
translated: “Lord, those bodhisattva great beings who, as soon as they hear this deep perfection of wisdom, will believe it, where have they died and transmigrated to be born here?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas thos ma thag tu mos par 'gyur /
analyzed: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas thos ma thag tu mos par 'gyur /
translated: “Subhūti, those bodhisattva great beings who, as soon as they hear this deep perfection of wisdom, will believe it,

original: zhum bar mi 'gyur /🔽yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur /🔽rmongs par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: zhum bar mi 'gyur / yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur / rmongs par mi 'gyur /
translated: will not be cowed,🔽will not be intimidated,🔽will not be confused,

original: the tshom za bar mi 'gyur /
analyzed: the tshom za bar mi 'gyur /
translated: will not be doubtful,

original: nem nur du mi 'gyur la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan par mngon par brtson par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: nem nur du mi 'gyur la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan par mngon par brtson par 'gyur zhing /
translated: they will not be uncertain, and they will strive to listen to this profound transcendent perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas kyang yid la byed pa de dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur bar yid la bya ba de dag 'gro'am 'ong ngam 'greng ngam 'dug gam nyal /🔽yang rung ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas kyang yid la byed pa de dag dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur bar yid la bya ba de dag 'gro'am 'ong ngam 'greng ngam 'dug gam nyal / yang rung ste /
translated: Even after they have listened to this profound transcendent perfection of wisdom, they will not be separated from those mental engagements, and they will not be separated from those mental engagements whether they are coming or going, whether they are standing or sitting, or whether they are lying down or not.🔽They will not be separated from those mental engagements whether they are coming or going, whether they are standing or sitting, or whether they are lying down or not.

original: rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par 'jig par mi byed cing chos smra ba'i gang zag de la yang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur te /🔽rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
analyzed: rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par 'jig par mi byed cing chos smra ba'i gang zag de la yang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur te / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
translated: They will always and constantly follow that individual who is a proponent of the doctrine.🔽Su­bhūti, just as a cow does not abandon her young calf,

original: ba drus ma be'u gzhon nur mi 'dor ba ltar rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'i don du ji srid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni khong du chud phar
analyzed: ba drus ma be'u gzhon nur mi 'dor ba ltar rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'i don du ji srid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni khong du chud phar
translated: in the same way, Su­bhūti, great bodhisattva beings, for the sake of this profound transcendent perfection of wisdom, will not abandon this profound transcendent perfection of wisdom until they have comprehended it.

original: bya ba dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / yongs su bsams pa dang / yid kyis rtogs par bya ba dang / lta bas legs par rab tu rtogs par ma byas pa de srid du chos smra ba de stong par mi 'gyur na /🔽rab 'byor theg pa @235a * //
analyzed: bya ba dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / yongs su bsams pa dang / yid kyis rtogs par bya ba dang / lta bas legs par rab tu rtogs par ma byas pa de srid du chos smra ba de stong par mi 'gyur na / rab 'byor theg pa @235a * //
translated: as long as they have not done so by way of action, bearing in mind, reading aloud, fully and properly comprehending it by way of thought, and by way of seeing.

original: la gsar du zhugs pa'i gang zag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni mi'i nang nyid nas shi 'phos nas mi'i nang du skyes pa'o //
analyzed: la gsar du zhugs pa'i gang zag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni mi'i nang nyid nas shi 'phos nas mi'i nang du skyes pa'o //
translated: Subhūti, those bodhisattva great beings who are beginners in the vehicle have died among humans and have been reborn among humans.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: de ni 'di ltar theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sngon yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sngon yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te /
translated: It is because those bodhisattva great beings who are beginners in the vehicle have previously written out and made into a book this perfection of wisdom,

original: me tog dang / spos dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba mang pos rim gror byas /
analyzed: me tog dang / spos dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba mang pos rim gror byas /
translated: and with flowers, incense, perfume, garlands, creams, powders, clothes, parasols, flags, and cymbals, and with rows of lamps all around,

original: bla mar byas /🔽bsti stang du byas /
analyzed: bla mar byas / bsti stang du byas /
translated: they venerated,🔽worshipped,🔽honored,

original: mchod par byas /🔽rjed par byas /
analyzed: mchod par byas / rjed par byas /
translated: revered,

original: bkur stir byas te /
analyzed: bkur stir byas te /
translated: and made offerings to them.

original: de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des mi'i nang nas shi 'phos nas mi'i nang du skyes te /
analyzed: de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des mi'i nang nas shi 'phos nas mi'i nang du skyes te /
translated: And by those wholesome roots, after they died among humans, they were reborn among humans,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni drag tu 'grub pa'i khyad par te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni drag tu 'grub pa'i khyad par te /
translated: and as soon as they heard this deep perfection of wisdom, they believed in it.”

original: 'gog pa'i skad cig ma gnyis pa yin no //
analyzed: 'gog pa'i skad cig ma gnyis pa yin no //
translated: This is the second moment of cessation.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag la bsnyen bkur bgyis shing 'phos te 'dir skye ba gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag la bsnyen bkur bgyis shing 'phos te 'dir skye ba gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu
translated: “Blessed One, are there any bodhisattva great beings who have served other blessed buddhas in other buddha fields, passed away from there, and been reborn here, who, as soon as they hear this profound perfection of wisdom,

original: mos shing mos par gyur nas kyang 'dri bar 'gyur ba dang / bris nas kyang 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / lung 'bogs par 'gyur ba dang / kha ton bgyid par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: mos shing mos par gyur nas kyang 'dri bar 'gyur ba dang / bris nas kyang 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / lung 'bogs par 'gyur ba dang / kha ton bgyid par 'gyur zhing /
translated: will be inspired, and, having been inspired, will ask questions about it, and, having asked questions about it, will write it out, hold it, recite it,

original: tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid par 'gyur ba'i yon tan 'di dag nyid dang ldan pa'i rnam grangs de lta bu dag mchis sam /
analyzed: tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid par 'gyur ba'i yon tan 'di dag nyid dang ldan pa'i rnam grangs de lta bu dag mchis sam /
translated: and properly pay attention to it? Are there any such categories of beings who have these very qualities?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /🔽rab 'byor de de bzhin no //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor de de bzhin no //
translated: The Blessed One replied,🔽“Subhūti, it is so!

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: It is just as you have said!

original: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag la bsnyen bkur byas shing /
analyzed: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag la bsnyen bkur byas shing /
translated: Subhūti, there are bodhisattva great beings who have attended on other buddha bhagavāns,

original: de nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos par 'gyur /
analyzed: de nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos par 'gyur /
translated: and after they have died and transmigrated from there, they are born here, and as soon as they hear this deep perfection of wisdom they will believe in it.

original: mos par gyur na /🔽kyang 'dri bar 'gyur /
analyzed: mos par gyur na / kyang 'dri bar 'gyur /
translated: Having believed in it,🔽they will copy it.

original: bris nas kyang 'dzin par 'gyur /🔽lung 'bogs par 'gyur /
analyzed: bris nas kyang 'dzin par 'gyur / lung 'bogs par 'gyur /
translated: Having copied it, they will hold it.🔽They will recite it.

original: kha ton byed par 'gyur /
analyzed: kha ton byed par 'gyur /
translated: They will master it.🔽They will properly pay attention to it.

original: tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur ba'i yon tan 'di dag nyid dang ldan pa'i rnam grangs de lta bu dag yod do //
analyzed: tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur ba'i yon tan 'di dag nyid dang ldan pa'i rnam grangs de lta bu dag yod do //
translated: There are those who have these very good qualities and are of that kind.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de ni 'di ltar byang chub @235b sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos so //
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar byang chub @235b sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos so //
translated: It is because those bodhisattva great beings have heard this deep perfection of wisdom from those buddha bhagavāns.

original: thos nas kyang bzung ngo //
analyzed: thos nas kyang bzung ngo //
translated: Having heard it, they have taken it up.🔽They have borne it in mind.

original: bcangs so / bcangs so //
analyzed: bcangs so / bcangs so //
translated: They have borne it in mind.

original: kha ton byas so //
analyzed: kha ton byas so //
translated: they have recited it;

original: tshul bzhin du yid la byas so //
analyzed: tshul bzhin du yid la byas so //
translated: they have properly paid attention to it;

original: de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang yid la byed pa de dag gis 'dir skye ba'o //
analyzed: de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang yid la byed pa de dag gis 'dir skye ba'o //
translated: and they have been reborn here through those wholesome roots and that attention.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' ldan gyi lha rnams nas shi 'phos nas 'dir mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye ba gang yin pa de yang yon tan 'di nyid dang ldan par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' ldan gyi lha rnams nas shi 'phos nas 'dir mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye ba gang yin pa de yang yon tan 'di nyid dang ldan par rig par bya'o //
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, you should know that bodhisattva great beings who have died among the Tuṣita gods and have been reborn here among humans also have these good qualities.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su dris pa ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su dris pa ste /
translated: Subhūti, it is because the bodhisattva great being Maitreya has asked about this profound perfection of wisdom.

original: de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des 'dir skye'o //
analyzed: de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des 'dir skye'o //
translated: They have been reborn here through those wholesome roots.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mthos la /
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mthos la /
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings who have heard this profound perfection of wisdom in the past

original: thos nas kyang yongs su dri ba ma byas par mi'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ba de ni nem nur du 'gyur /
analyzed: thos nas kyang yongs su dri ba ma byas par mi'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ba de ni nem nur du 'gyur /
translated: Having heard it, they will not ask questions about it, and they will be born in the human world.

original: rmongs par 'gyur /
analyzed: rmongs par 'gyur /
translated: They will be doubtful,

original: sems zhum par 'gyur te /
analyzed: sems zhum par 'gyur te /
translated: and their minds will be cowed.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ma thos la /
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ma thos la /
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, those bodhisattva great beings who have not heard this deep perfection of wisdom before,

original: thos nas kyang yongs su dri bar ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa'i tshe the tshom du 'gyur /
analyzed: thos nas kyang yongs su dri bar ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa'i tshe the tshom du 'gyur /
translated: and have not asked questions about it, will be doubtful,

original: rmongs par 'gyur /
analyzed: rmongs par 'gyur /
translated: will be confused,

original: sems zhum par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems zhum par 'gyur ro //
translated: and their minds will be cowed when this deep perfection of wisdom is being taught.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sngon gyi mthar yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sngon gyi mthar yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, it is just like those bodhisattva great beings who have not previously heard the perfection of concentration, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of patience,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma thos yongs su dri ba ma byas pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma thos yongs su dri ba ma byas pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe /
translated: and the perfection of morality and the perfection of giving, then when this perfection of giving is being taught,

original: nem nur du 'gyur /🔽rmongs par 'gyur /
analyzed: nem nur du 'gyur / rmongs par 'gyur /
translated: he will be doubtful,🔽confused,

original: sems zhum par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems zhum par 'gyur ro //
translated: and his mind will become cowed.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sngon gyis mthar yang nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du ma thos yongs su dri ba ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sngon gyis mthar yang nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du ma thos yongs su dri ba ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, those bodhisattva great beings who in the past have not listened to and have not asked questions about inner emptiness, up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature, when this deep perfection of wisdom is being taught,

original: thos nas @236a * //🔽nem nur du 'gyur /🔽rmongs par 'gyur /
analyzed: thos nas @236a * // nem nur du 'gyur / rmongs par 'gyur /
translated: having heard it,🔽they will be doubtful,🔽confused,

original: sems zhum par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems zhum par 'gyur ro //
translated: and their minds will become cowed.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sngon gyi mthar yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su dri bar ma byas pa'am /
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sngon gyi mthar yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su dri bar ma byas pa'am /
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti, those bodhisattva great beings who in the past did not ask questions about the four applications of mindfulness,

original: ma thos pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe /🔽thos nas kyang nem nur du 'gyur /
analyzed: ma thos pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe / thos nas kyang nem nur du 'gyur /
translated: when this deep perfection of wisdom is being taught,

original: rmongs par 'gyur /
analyzed: rmongs par 'gyur /
translated: will be doubtful,🔽confused,

original: sems zhum par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems zhum par 'gyur ro //
translated: and their minds will be cowed.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sngon gyi mthar yang yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sngon gyi mthar yang yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti, those bodhisattva great beings who in the past did not hear about the four right efforts, the four legs of miraculous power, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven limbs of awakening,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma thos la /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma thos la /
translated: and the eightfold noble path,

original: thos nas kyang yongs su dri bar ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe /
analyzed: thos nas kyang yongs su dri bar ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe /
translated: when this deep perfection of wisdom is being taught,

original: thos nas nem nur du 'gyur /
analyzed: thos nas nem nur du 'gyur /
translated: Having heard it, they will be doubtful,

original: rmongs par 'gyur /
analyzed: rmongs par 'gyur /
translated: confused,

original: sems zhum par 'gyur /
analyzed: sems zhum par 'gyur /
translated: their minds will be discouraged,

original: sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro //
translated: and their minds will change.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sngon gyi mthar yang bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sngon gyi mthar yang bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang /
translated: Moreover, Subhūti, those bodhisattva great beings who in the past have practiced the four concentrations, four immeasurables, four formless absorptions, four noble truths, five clairvoyances,

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /
translated: emptiness, signlessness, wishlessness, eight liberations, nine serial absorptions, all meditative stabilizations, all dhāraṇī gateways,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma thos la /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma thos la /
translated: the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: thos nas kyang yongs su dri bar ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe /
analyzed: thos nas kyang yongs su dri bar ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe /
translated: When this deep perfection of wisdom is being taught,

original: thos nas nem nur du 'gyur /🔽rmongs par 'gyur /
analyzed: thos nas nem nur du 'gyur / rmongs par 'gyur /
translated: having heard it, they will be doubtful,🔽confused,

original: sems zhum par 'gyur /
analyzed: sems zhum par 'gyur /
translated: their minds will be cowed,

original: sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro //🔽rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sngon gyi mthar yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma thos yongs su dri bar ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
analyzed: sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro // rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sngon gyi mthar yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma thos yongs su dri bar ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
translated: and their minds will turn away from it.

original: mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe /🔽@236b nem nur du 'gyur /
analyzed: mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe / @236b nem nur du 'gyur /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, those persons, bodhisattva great beings who have not heard of unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening in the past, and have not asked about it, when this deep perfection of wisdom is being taught,🔽having heard it, will be doubtful,

original: rmongs par 'gyur /
analyzed: rmongs par 'gyur /
translated: confused,

original: sems zhum par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems zhum par 'gyur ro //
translated: their minds will be discouraged.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyi ma gcig gam /
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyi ma gcig gam /
translated: “Moreover, Su­bhūti, those great bodhisattva beings who, in the past, have not listened to this profound transcendent perfection of wisdom for one day,

original: nyi ma gnyis sam /
analyzed: nyi ma gnyis sam /
translated: or for two days,

original: nyi ma gsum mam /
analyzed: nyi ma gsum mam /
translated: or for three days,

original: nyi ma bzhi'am /
analyzed: nyi ma bzhi'am /
translated: or for four days,🔽or for five days,

original: lnga'am / drug gam /
analyzed: lnga'am / drug gam /
translated: or for six days,

original: nyi ma bcu las ma thos yongs su dri bar ma byas ma bsgoms mang du ma byas /
analyzed: nyi ma bcu las ma thos yongs su dri bar ma byas ma bsgoms mang du ma byas /
translated: or for ten days, and who have not asked questions about it, have not meditated on it, have not done much of it,

original: tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'phrog par 'gyur /
analyzed: tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'phrog par 'gyur /
translated: and have not properly attended to it, will be deprived of this profound transcendent perfection of wisdom,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro //🔽de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar 'gyur te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro // de ci'i phyir zhe na / rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar 'gyur te /
translated: and will be separated from the transcendent perfection of wisdom.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ma thos /🔽yongs su ma dris /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ma thos / yongs su ma dris /
translated: If you ask why, Su­bhūti, it is because those great bodhisattva beings who, in the past, have not listened to this profound transcendent perfection of wisdom,🔽have not asked questions about it,

original: yongs su ma bsgoms /
analyzed: yongs su ma bsgoms /
translated: have not meditated on it,

original: mang du ma byas /
analyzed: mang du ma byas /
translated: He has not done much🔽and has not properly paid attention to it.

original: tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la bar bar mos par 'gyur /
analyzed: tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la bar bar mos par 'gyur /
translated: He has faith in the profound perfection of wisdom at one time,

original: bar bar mos pa med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: bar bar mos pa med par 'gyur te /
translated: and at another time he has no faith in it.

original: de yang ldam ldem gyis blo phrogs shing shing bal gyi zegs ma bzhin du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yang ldam ldem gyis blo phrogs shing shing bal gyi zegs ma bzhin du 'gyur ro //
translated: He is fickle-minded and is like cotton wool.

original: rab 'byor gang zag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni yun ring po nas theg pa chen po la zhugs pa ma yin /
analyzed: rab 'byor gang zag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni yun ring po nas theg pa chen po la zhugs pa ma yin /
translated: Subhūti, you should know that this bodhisattva great being has not long set out in the vehicle,

original: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung pa ma yin /
analyzed: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung pa ma yin /
translated: has not been taken hold of by a good spiritual friend,

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur byas pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur byas pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: and has not attended on the perfect buddhas.

original: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'i lung ma mnos /
analyzed: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'i lung ma mnos /
translated: Subhūti, this bodhisattva great being has not received the transmission of this deep perfection of wisdom,

original: kha ton ma byas la /
analyzed: kha ton ma byas la /
translated: has not recited it,

original: tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas /
analyzed: tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas /
translated: and has not properly paid attention to it.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs so //
translated: They have not trained in the perfection of wisdom.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs so //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs so //
translated: They have not trained in the perfection of concentration, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of patience, the perfection of morality, or the perfection of giving.

original: nang stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so //
translated: They have not trained in inner emptiness.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la ma bslabs so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la ma bslabs so //
translated: They have not trained in . . . up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la ma bslabs so //🔽yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag @237a * //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la ma bslabs so // yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag @237a * //
translated: They have not trained in the applications of mindfulness.

original: brgyad pa lam bslabs so //
analyzed: brgyad pa lam bslabs so //
translated: They have not trained in the right efforts, the legs of miraculous power, the faculties, the powers, the limbs of awakening, or the noble eightfold path.

original: mngon par shes pa lnga dang / tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / rnam par thar ba brgyad la ma bslabs /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa lnga dang / tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / rnam par thar ba brgyad la ma bslabs /
translated: They have not trained in the five kinds of supernatural knowledge, the four immeasurable aspirations, the concentrations, the formless absorptions, the noble truths, or the eight deliverances.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa rnams la ma bslabs /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa rnams la ma bslabs /
translated: They have not trained in the nine serial absorptions, emptiness, or the signless.

original: mngon par shes pa la ma bslabs /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa la ma bslabs /
translated: They have not trained in the clairvoyances.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la ma bslabs /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la ma bslabs /
translated: They have not trained in the meditative stabilizations, or the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la ma bslabs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la ma bslabs so //
translated: They have not trained in the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, or the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la ma bslabs so /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la ma bslabs so /
translated: They have not trained in the knowledge of all aspects.

original: // / bam po bzhi bcu drug pa /
analyzed: // / bam po bzhi bcu drug pa /
translated: PART IV

original: rab 'byor gang zag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor gang zag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs par rig par bya ste /
translated: “Subhūti, you should know that this bodhisattva great being is a beginner in the vehicle.

original: de ni chos 'dir dad pa tsam dang / dga' ba tsam dang ldan par zad de /
analyzed: de ni chos 'dir dad pa tsam dang / dga' ba tsam dang ldan par zad de /
translated: He has only faith and joy in this Dharma,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bri ba'am /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bri ba'am /
translated: but he is not able to write out this deep perfection of wisdom,

original: lung 'bogs pa'am /
analyzed: lung 'bogs pa'am /
translated: or to have it written out,

original: kha ton bya ba'am /
analyzed: kha ton bya ba'am /
translated: or to recite it,

original: tshul bzhin du yid la byed par mi nus so //🔽rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: tshul bzhin du yid la byed par mi nus so // rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: or to attend properly to it.

original: rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri bar mi 'gyur /🔽lung 'bogs par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri bar mi 'gyur / lung 'bogs par mi 'gyur /
translated: “Subhūti, those sons of a good family or daughters of a good family in the Bodhisattva Vehicle who do not write out this deep perfection of wisdom,🔽do not have it written out,

original: kha ton byed par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: kha ton byed par mi 'gyur /
translated: do not recite it,

original: tshul bzhin du yid la byed par mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: tshul bzhin du yid la byed par mi 'gyur la /
translated: do not attend properly to it,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dis gzhan la phan 'dogs par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dis gzhan la phan 'dogs par mi 'gyur /
translated: and do not benefit others with this deep perfection of wisdom,

original: de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /🔽rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis gzhan la phan 'dogs par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis gzhan la phan 'dogs par mi 'gyur /
translated: Similarly, the perfection of meditative stability, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of patience, the perfection of ethical discipline, and the perfection of generosity will not bring benefit to others.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di dang mthun par spyod par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di dang mthun par spyod par mi 'gyur /
translated: They will not practice in accord with this profound transcendent perfection of wisdom.

original: de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: Similarly, they will not practice in accord with the transcendent perfection of meditative stability, the transcendent perfection of perseverance, the transcendent perfection of patience, the transcendent perfection of ethical discipline, the transcendent perfection of generosity,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen @237b pa nyid kyi bar dang mthun par spyod par mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen @237b pa nyid kyi bar dang mthun par spyod par mi 'gyur na /
translated: and up to the transcendent perfection of omniscience.

original: de rnams ni sa gzhan gnyis po las sa gcig 'dod par bya ste /
analyzed: de rnams ni sa gzhan gnyis po las sa gcig 'dod par bya ste /
translated: Those should be known as belonging to one of the other two levels.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: What are those two?

original: nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: They are the śrāvaka level

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o //
translated: and the pratyekabuddha level.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: It is because those sons of a good family

original: rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ma bris /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ma bris /
translated: or those daughters of a good family have not written out,

original: ma bstan / kha ton du ma byas /🔽tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas la /
analyzed: ma bstan / kha ton du ma byas / tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas la /
translated: have not taught, have not recited,🔽and have not properly paid attention to this deep perfection of wisdom in the past.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis gang su la yang phan ma btags /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis gang su la yang phan ma btags /
translated: They have not benefited anyone with this perfection of wisdom.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di dang yang mthun par ma spyad de /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di dang yang mthun par ma spyad de /
translated: Those bodhisattva great beings have not practiced in accordance with this deep perfection of wisdom.

original: de'i phyir rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: de'i phyir rigs kyi bu'am /
