translated: Therefore, those sons of a good family🔽or those daughters of a good family

original: rigs kyi bu mo de rnams kyis sa gnyis rab tu 'dod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni yang dag par 'grub pa'i khyad par 'gog pa'i skad cig ma gsum pa yin no //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo de rnams kyis sa gnyis rab tu 'dod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni yang dag par 'grub pa'i khyad par 'gog pa'i skad cig ma gsum pa yin no //
translated: This is the third moment of cessation, the special attainment.

original: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na gang gi tshe rgya mtshor gru zhig par gyur ba de'i tshe der skyes bu gang shing ngam rkyal pa'am /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na gang gi tshe rgya mtshor gru zhig par gyur ba de'i tshe der skyes bu gang shing ngam rkyal pa'am /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this: when a ship breaks up on the ocean, at that time, if a person does not hold on to a log, a plank,

original: ro la mi 'ju mi 'dzin na /
analyzed: ro la mi 'ju mi 'dzin na /
translated: or a corpse,

original: rab 'byor skyes bu de dag ni rgya mtsho chen po'i pha rol tu ma phyin par dus byed par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor skyes bu de dag ni rgya mtsho chen po'i pha rol tu ma phyin par dus byed par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, you should know that those people will not reach the other shore of the great ocean, but will die.

original: rab 'byor gang rgya mtsho'i dbus su gru zhig pa ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor gang rgya mtsho'i dbus su gru zhig pa ni /
translated: Subhūti, those people in the middle of the ocean whose ship has broken up,

original: shing ngam rkyal pa'am /
analyzed: shing ngam rkyal pa'am /
translated: who hold on to a log, a plank,

original: ro la 'ju zhing 'dzin pa'i skyes bu de dag ni rgya mtshor dus byed par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: ro la 'ju zhing 'dzin pa'i skyes bu de dag ni rgya mtshor dus byed par mi 'gyur te /
translated: or a corpse, will not die in the ocean.

original: bde zhing nyams nyes med par rgya mtsho chen po nas pha rol gyi 'gram du phyin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: bde zhing nyams nyes med par rgya mtsho chen po nas pha rol gyi 'gram du phyin par 'gyur te /
translated: They will reach the other shore of the great ocean safely and without mishap.

original: ma smas ma nyams par thang la phyin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma smas ma nyams par thang la phyin par 'gyur ro //
translated: and will arrive at the plain without being harmed or injured.

original: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa tsam dang rab tu dad pa tsam dang / dga' ba tsam dang / ldan pa gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri bar mi 'gyur /🔽ston par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa tsam dang rab tu dad pa tsam dang / dga' ba tsam dang / ldan pa gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri bar mi 'gyur / ston par mi 'gyur /
translated: “In the same way, Subhūti, if sons of a good family or daughters of a good family in the Bodhisattva Vehicle who have only faith, only a superior faith, only a joy, only a liking, only a confidence, only a desire to do, only a delight, only a serene confidence, only a forbearance, only a superior attitude, only a basis in the perfection of wisdom, and only a basis in the perfection of concentration, perfection of perseverance, perfection of patience, perfection of morality, and perfection of giving, but do not write out this deep perfection of wisdom,🔽do not teach it,🔽do not recite it,🔽do not properly pay attention to it,

original: kha ton du byed par mi 'gyur /🔽tshul bzhin du yid la byed par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: kha ton du byed par mi 'gyur / tshul bzhin du yid la byed par mi 'gyur /
translated: and do not rely on it,🔽Subhūti, you should know that those sons of a good family or daughters of a good family in the Bodhisattva Vehicle

original: rten par mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: rten par mi 'gyur na /
translated: will fall short of awakening in the interim.🔽Without attaining the knowledge of all aspects, they will actualize the śrāvaka level or🔽the pratyekabuddha level.”

original: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: “Subhūti, if sons of a good family or daughters of a good family in the Bodhisattva Vehicle do not write out this deep perfection of wisdom,🔽do not teach it,🔽do not recite it,🔽do not properly pay attention to it,🔽and do not rely on it,🔽Subhūti, you should know that those sons of a good family or daughters of a good family in the Bodhisattva Vehicle

original: rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bar ma dor byang chub las nyams par 'gyur bar rig par bya ste /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bar ma dor byang chub las nyams par 'gyur bar rig par bya ste /
translated: will fall short of awakening in the interim.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thong par nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thong par nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: Without attaining the knowledge of all aspects, they will actualize the śrāvaka level or

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa mngon du byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa mngon du byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: the pratyekabuddha level.”

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin @238a * //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin @238a * //
translated: the perfection of perseverance,🔽the perfection of patience,🔽the perfection of discipline,

original: pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri bar mi 'gyur /🔽ston par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri bar mi 'gyur / ston par mi 'gyur /
translated: and the perfection of generosity.🔽They will not teach,

original: kha ton byed par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: kha ton byed par mi 'gyur /
translated: recite,

original: tshul bzhin du yid la byed par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: tshul bzhin du yid la byed par mi 'gyur /
translated: or properly pay attention to

original: rten par mi 'gyur ba'i bar dang / de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /
analyzed: rten par mi 'gyur ba'i bar dang / de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /
translated: the thirty-seven aspects of enlightenment, the four noble truths, the immeasurables, the meditative stabilities, the formless meditative absorptions,

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
translated: the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all things, the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, the emptiness of essential nature, the eight aspects of liberation, the nine serial steps of meditative absorption, emptiness, signlessness,

original: smon pa med pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /
analyzed: smon pa med pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /
translated: wishlessness, the ten powers, the four forms of fearlessness, the four forms of correct understanding, the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas,🔽and the knowledge of all aspects, and they will not write out,🔽teach,🔽recite,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang / mtshungs par ldan pa'i mdo sde 'dri bar mi 'gyur /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang / mtshungs par ldan pa'i mdo sde 'dri bar mi 'gyur /
translated: or properly pay attention to this sūtra that is endowed with such qualities,

original: ston par mi 'gyur /🔽kha ton byed par mi 'gyur /🔽tshul bzhin du yid la byed par mi 'gyur /🔽rten par mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: ston par mi 'gyur /🔽kha ton byed par mi 'gyur /🔽tshul bzhin du yid la byed par mi 'gyur /🔽rten par mi 'gyur na /
translated: and they will not rely on it,

original: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: Subhūti, sons of a good family in the Bodhisattva Vehicle🔽

original: rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bar ma dor byang chub las nyams par 'gyur bar rig par bya ste /🔽rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bar ma dor byang chub las nyams par 'gyur bar rig par bya ste / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: “Subhūti, you should know that those sons of a good family and those daughters of a good family in the Bodhisattva Vehicle will fall short of awakening in the meantime.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa mngon du byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa mngon du byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: Without attaining the knowledge of all aspects, they will actualize the śrāvaka level or the pratyekabuddha level.

original: rab 'byor gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i don du dad pa yod /
analyzed: rab 'byor gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i don du dad pa yod /
translated: “Subhūti, those persons in the Bodhisattva Vehicle who have faith,

original: bzod pa yod /
analyzed: bzod pa yod /
translated: patience,

original: dga' ba yod /
analyzed: dga' ba yod /
translated: joy,

original: lhag pa'i bsam pa yod /🔽'dod pa yod /🔽mos pa yod /
analyzed: lhag pa'i bsam pa yod / 'dod pa yod / mos pa yod /
translated: superior intention,🔽desire,🔽interest,

original: 'dun pa yod /
analyzed: 'dun pa yod /
translated: zeal,

original: mi gtong ba yod /🔽brtson 'grus mi gtong ba yod la /
analyzed: mi gtong ba yod / brtson 'grus mi gtong ba yod la /
translated: non-abandonment,🔽and indefatigable perseverance for the sake of fully awakening to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri bar 'gyur /
analyzed: de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri bar 'gyur /
translated: and who write out this perfection of wisdom,🔽recite it,

original: lung 'bogs par 'gyur /🔽kha ton byed par 'gyur /
analyzed: lung 'bogs par 'gyur /🔽kha ton byed par 'gyur /
translated: and

original: tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur /
analyzed: tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur /
translated: They will be those who properly pay attention,

original: rten par 'gyur te /🔽rab 'byor rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: rten par 'gyur te / rab 'byor rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: and they will be those who rely on it.

original: rigs kyi bu mo gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang @238b chub tu dad pa dang / bzod pa dang / rab tu dang ba dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / 'dod pa dang / mos pa dang / 'dun pa dang /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang @238b chub tu dad pa dang / bzod pa dang / rab tu dang ba dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / 'dod pa dang / mos pa dang / 'dun pa dang /
translated: Subhūti, there are sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage who have faith in, forbearance for, are convinced by, aspire to, are intent upon, are keen for,🔽and do not give up on unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment.

original: mi gtong ba dang / brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba yod pa des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bzung ba yin /
analyzed: mi gtong ba dang / brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba yod pa des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bzung ba yin /
translated: They are those who have fully grasped the transcendent perfection of wisdom,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bzung ba yin /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bzung ba yin /
translated: and they are those who have fully grasped the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration, the transcendent perfection of perseverance, the transcendent perfection of tolerance, the transcendent perfection of ethical discipline, and the transcendent perfection of generosity.

original: des nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang ; byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /
analyzed: des nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang ; byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /
translated: They have taken up the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, and the emptiness of emptiness, up to the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities, the thirty-seven aspects of enlightenment, the noble truths,

original: tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su bzung ba yin /
analyzed: tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su bzung ba yin /
translated: the immeasurables, the dhyānas, and the formless absorptions.

original: des rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su bzung ba yin /
analyzed: des rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su bzung ba yin /
translated: They have taken up the eight aspects of liberation, the nine serial steps of meditative absorption, emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness.

original: des stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su bzung ba yin /
analyzed: des stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su bzung ba yin /
translated: They have taken up the ten powers, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct qualities of the Buddha.

original: des ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su bzung ba yin /
analyzed: des ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su bzung ba yin /
translated: He will have taken hold of the meditative stabilities, the dhāraṇī gateways, and the clairvoyances.

original: des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yongs su bzung ba yin te /
analyzed: des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yongs su bzung ba yin te /
translated: He will have taken hold of , up to and including omniscience.

original: de ni bar ma dor byang chub las nyams par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ni bar ma dor byang chub las nyams par mi 'gyur te /
translated: He will not regress from awakening in the interim.

original: de dag ni nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te /
analyzed: de dag ni nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te /
translated: He will have gone beyond the śrāvaka level and the pratyekabuddha level.

original: sems can yongs su smin par byas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas te /
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par byas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas te /
translated: He will have brought beings to maturity, purified a buddhafield,🔽and fully awakened to unsurpassed, perfect buddhahood.”

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa'i khyad par 'gog pa'i skad cig ma bzhi pa yin no //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa'i khyad par 'gog pa'i skad cig ma bzhi pa yin no //
translated: This is the fourth moment of the distinctive object.

original: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
translated: “Subhūti, it is like this:

original: bud med dam skyes pa la la zhig bum pa so ma btang bas chu gzung bar bya bar sems na /
analyzed: bud med dam skyes pa la la zhig bum pa so ma btang bas chu gzung bar bya bar sems na /
translated: Suppose a woman or man thinks to carry water in a pot that has not been fired in a kiln.

original: rab 'byor bum pa de ni ring por mi gnas te myur du 'gyes shing 'jig par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor bum pa de ni ring por mi gnas te myur du 'gyes shing 'jig par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o //
translated: “Subhūti, you should know that that pot will not last long, but will quickly break and be destroyed.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bum pa de so ma btang ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: bum pa de so ma btang ba'i phyir te /
translated: Because that pot is not fired.

original: de ni tha mar sa nyid du 'gyur ro //🔽rab @239a * //🔽'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: de ni tha mar sa nyid du 'gyur ro // rab @239a * // 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: In the end it will just be earth.

original: rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir dad pa yang yod /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir dad pa yang yod /
translated: “Subhūti, in the same way, there are sons of a good family and daughters of a good family in the Bodhisattva Vehicle who have faith,

original: bzod pa yang yod /
analyzed: bzod pa yang yod /
translated: patience,

original: dga' ba yang yod /
analyzed: dga' ba yang yod /
translated: joy,

original: lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod ;
analyzed: lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod ;
translated: superior attitude,

original: 'dod pa yang yod /🔽mos pa yang yod /
analyzed: 'dod pa yang yod / mos pa yang yod /
translated: desire,🔽interest,

original: 'dun pa yang yod /🔽mi gtong ba yang yod /🔽brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba yang yod mod kyi /🔽de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: 'dun pa yang yod / mi gtong ba yang yod / brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba yang yod mod kyi / de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /
translated: zeal,🔽and indefatigability in order to fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,🔽but they are not held by the perfection of wisdom,

original: thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung /
translated: and they are not held by skillful means.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /
translated: the perfection of meditative stability, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of patience, the perfection of moral discipline, and the perfection of generosity;

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su ma bzung /
translated: inner emptiness, outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, and the other aspects of emptiness, up to the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities;

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pas yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pas yongs su ma bzung /
translated: the applications of mindfulness,

original: yang dag par spong bas yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: yang dag par spong bas yongs su ma bzung /
translated: the right efforts,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas yongs su ma bzung /🔽dbang pos yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas yongs su ma bzung / dbang pos yongs su ma bzung /
translated: the legs of miraculous power,🔽the faculties,

original: stobs kyis yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: stobs kyis yongs su ma bzung /
translated: the powers,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag gis yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag gis yongs su ma bzung /
translated: the branches of awakening,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung /
translated: and the path with its eight branches.

original: mngon par shes pa lngas yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa lngas yongs su ma bzung /
translated: not fully apprehending the five superknowledges,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung /

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung /
translated: not fully apprehending the four formless absorptions,

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung /
translated: not fully apprehending the eight aspects of liberation,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su ma bzung /
translated: not fully apprehending the nine serial steps of meditative absorption,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas yongs su ma bzung /
translated: not fully apprehending the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gateways to liberation,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung /
translated: not fully apprehending the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four assurances, the four kinds of exact knowledge, and the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su ma bzung na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i @239b rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su ma bzung na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i @239b rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: up to not fully apprehending the knowledge of all aspects, those sons of enlightened heritage or

original: rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bar ma dor nye zhor 'gyur bar rig par bya'o //🔽rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bar ma dor nye zhor 'gyur bar rig par bya'o // rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: “Those sons and daughters of good family should be known to have a short life span.

original: rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bar ma dor nye zhor 'gyur ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bar ma dor nye zhor 'gyur ba gang zhe na /
translated: “Subhūti, what is the short life span of those sons of a good family or daughters of a good family in the Bodhisattva Vehicle?

original: 'di lta ste /🔽nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: It is this:🔽the śrāvaka level

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o //
translated: or the pratyekabuddha level.

original: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
translated: “Subhūti, it is like this:

original: skyes pa'am bud med la la zhig bum pa so legs par btang bas chu klung ngam /
analyzed: skyes pa'am bud med la la zhig bum pa so legs par btang bas chu klung ngam /
translated: Suppose a man or a woman were to draw water from a river,

original: mtsho'am / mtshe'u 'am /
analyzed: mtsho'am / mtshe'u 'am /
translated: a lake, a pond,

original: khron pa nas chu 'chu na /
analyzed: khron pa nas chu 'chu na /
translated: or a well with a water pot that has been well fired.

original: rab 'byor chu 'chu ba de'i bum pa de ni bde bar khyim du phyin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor chu 'chu ba de'i bum pa de ni bde bar khyim du phyin par rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, you should know that the water pot of that person who is drawing water will safely return home.

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa yang yod /🔽bzod pa yang yod /
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa yang yod / bzod pa yang yod /
translated: In the same way, Subhūti, it should be known that a bodhisattva great being who has faith,🔽has patience,

original: rab tu dang ba yang yod /
analyzed: rab tu dang ba yang yod /
translated: and has full conviction

original: lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod /🔽'dod pa yang yod /🔽mos pa yang yod /
analyzed: lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod / 'dod pa yang yod / mos pa yang yod /
translated: They have higher intention,🔽they have desire,🔽they have interest,

original: 'dun pa yang yod /🔽mi gtong ba yang yod /
analyzed: 'dun pa yang yod / mi gtong ba yang yod /
translated: they have aspiration,🔽they are not stingy,

original: brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba yang yod la ;
analyzed: brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba yang yod la ;
translated: and they do not give up on perseverance.

original: de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /
analyzed: de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /
translated: Moreover, they are embraced by the perfection of wisdom,

original: thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung /
analyzed: thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung /
translated: they are embraced by skillful means,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /🔽brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /
translated: they are embraced by the perfection of meditative concentration,🔽they are embraced by the perfection of perseverance,

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /
translated: they are embraced by the perfection of patience,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /
translated: they are embraced by the perfection of moral discipline,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /
translated: and they are embraced by the perfection of generosity.

original: de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su bzung na /
analyzed: de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su bzung na /
translated: Similarly, if they are embraced by the knowledge of all aspects,

original: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'di lta ste /
translated: Subhūti, those bodhisattva great beings are like this:

original: nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: They are in the śrāvaka level🔽or the pratyekabuddha level.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar bar ma dor nye zhor mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar bar ma dor nye zhor mi 'gyur te /
translated: He does not fall in the middle to the stage of a Pratyekabuddha.🔽He will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening without being damaged or impaired.🔽This is the difference in the support.

original: ma smas ma nyams par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni rten gyi khyad par lam gyi skad cig ma dang po yin no //
analyzed: ma smas ma nyams par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni rten gyi khyad par lam gyi skad cig ma dang po yin no //
translated: The first moment of the path is as follows.

original: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this.

original: rgya mtsho'i gru ma bsdams shing zags lhan ma byas par rdzas bcug ste chu la btang na /
analyzed: rgya mtsho'i gru ma bsdams shing zags lhan ma byas par rdzas bcug ste chu la btang na /
translated: A ship on the ocean is not well-fastened, and the cargo is not well-secured, and it is put into the water.

original: rab 'byor gru de ni bar du zhig par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rab 'byor gru de ni bar du zhig par 'gyur te /
translated: Subhūti, that ship will break up in the middle.

original: gru yang logs shig / rdzas kyang logs shig tu 'gyur bar rig par bya ste /
analyzed: gru yang logs shig / rdzas kyang logs shig tu 'gyur bar rig par bya ste /
translated: It should be understood that the ship will be in one place and the cargo in another.

original: de ltar tshong pa de thabs mi mkhas pas gnod pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur zhing rin po che chen po las yongs su nyams par 'gyur @240a * //🔽bar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar tshong pa de thabs mi mkhas pas gnod pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur zhing rin po che chen po las yongs su nyams par 'gyur @240a * //🔽bar rig par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood that the merchant will be greatly harmed by his lack of skill in means and will lose the great jewels.

original: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa yang yod /
analyzed: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa yang yod /
translated: In the same way, Subhūti, bodhisattvas have faith,

original: bzod pa yang yod /
analyzed: bzod pa yang yod /
translated: patience,

original: dga' ba yang yod /
analyzed: dga' ba yang yod /
translated: joy,

original: lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod /
analyzed: lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod /
translated: higher intention,

original: 'dod pa yang yod /🔽mos pa yang yod /
analyzed: 'dod pa yang yod / mos pa yang yod /
translated: desire,🔽interest,🔽zeal,

original: 'dun pa yang yod /🔽mi gtong ba yang yod /
analyzed: 'dun pa yang yod / mi gtong ba yang yod /
translated: generosity,

original: brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba yod mod kyi /
analyzed: brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba yod mod kyi /
translated: and indefatigable perseverance for the sake of unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /
translated: But if they are not held by the perfection of wisdom,

original: thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung /
translated: not held by skillful means,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /🔽brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /
translated: not held by the perfection of concentration,🔽not held by the perfection of perseverance,

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /
translated: not held by the perfection of patience,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /
translated: not held by the perfection of morality,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /
translated: and not held by the perfection of generosity,

original: stong pa nyid thams cad kyis yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: stong pa nyid thams cad kyis yongs su ma bzung /

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyis yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyis yongs su ma bzung /
translated: it is not upheld by the thirty-seven aspects of enlightenment,

original: tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /
translated: it is not upheld by the immeasurables, the concentrations, or the formless absorptions,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /
translated: it is not upheld by the four noble truths,

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung /
translated: it is not upheld by the eight aspects of liberation,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su ma bzung /
translated: it is not upheld by the nine serial steps of meditative absorption,

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas yongs su ma bzung /
translated: it is not upheld by emptiness, signlessness, or aspirationlessness,

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /
translated: it is not upheld by all the meditative stabilities, the dhāraṇī gateways, or the extrasensory powers,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su ma bzung /
translated: it is not upheld by the ten powers of the tathāgatas,

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /
translated: it is not upheld by the four assurances,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /🔽rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su ma bzung na /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su ma bzung na /
translated: and not embraced by the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening, the ten powers of a tathāgata, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha;

original: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' de ni bar ma dor nye zhor 'gyur te /
analyzed: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' de ni bar ma dor nye zhor 'gyur te /
translated: and not embraced by the knowledge of all aspects, then, Subhūti, that bodhisattva will be lost in the middle,

original: 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rin po che'i phung po'i don chen po las yongs su nyams par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rin po che'i phung po'i don chen po las yongs su nyams par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o //
translated: and you should know that he will have fallen from the great goal of the heap of jewels that is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bar ma do'i nye zho gang zhe na /🔽'di lta ste nyan thos kyi @240b kyi sa'am /
analyzed: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bar ma do'i nye zho gang zhe na / 'di lta ste nyan thos kyi @240b kyi sa'am /
translated: “Subhūti, what is the loss in the middle of bodhisattva great beings?

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o //
translated: It is this: the śrāvaka level or the pratyekabuddha level.🔽Subhūti, it is like this:

original: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
translated: For example,

original: skyes bu mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can la la zhig rgya mtsho chen po'i gru shin tu bsdams shing shin tu bstar bar rdzas bcug nas mthun pa'i rlung dang bstun te chu la gtong na /
analyzed: skyes bu mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can la la zhig rgya mtsho chen po'i gru shin tu bsdams shing shin tu bstar bar rdzas bcug nas mthun pa'i rlung dang bstun te chu la gtong na /
translated: “Subhūti, suppose some wise person were to load a ship with cargo and set out on the great ocean, and that ship were to be well-fastened and well-rigged, and the cargo were to be well-stowed.

original: rab 'byor rgya mtsho'i gru de ni bar ma dor zhig par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: rab 'byor rgya mtsho'i gru de ni bar ma dor zhig par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Subhūti, that ship will not break up on the way.

original: gru de ni phyogs gang du bgrod pa der phyin par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gru de ni phyogs gang du bgrod pa der phyin par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that that ship will reach the destination it is headed for.

original: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa yang yod /
analyzed: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa yang yod /
translated: “Subhūti, in the same way, if bodhisattva great beings have faith in unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: bzod pa yang yod /
analyzed: bzod pa yang yod /
translated: have patience,

original: dga' ba yang yod /🔽rab tu dang ba yang yod /
analyzed: dga' ba yang yod / rab tu dang ba yang yod /
translated: have joy,🔽have clear faith,

original: lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod /🔽'dod pa yang yod /🔽mos pa yang yod /
analyzed: lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod / 'dod pa yang yod / mos pa yang yod /
translated: have a higher motivation,🔽have desire,🔽have interest,

original: 'dun pa yang yod /🔽mi gtong ba yang yod /
analyzed: 'dun pa yang yod / mi gtong ba yang yod /
translated: have aspiration,🔽have non-rejection,

original: brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba yang yod la /
analyzed: brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba yang yod la /
translated: and do not give up trying,

original: de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /
analyzed: de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /
translated: It is embraced by the perfection of wisdom.

original: thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung /
analyzed: thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung /
translated: It is embraced by skill in means.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /
translated: It is embraced by the perfection of concentration, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of patience, the perfection of morality, and the perfection of generosity.

original: stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / tang nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung /
analyzed: stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / tang nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung /
translated: It is embraced by all the emptinesses, the dharmas on the side of awakening, the meditative stabilizations, the dhāraṇī gateways, the immeasurables, the concentrations, and the formless absorptions.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung /
translated: It is embraced by the noble truths.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su bzung /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su bzung /
translated: It is embraced by the eight deliverances and the nine serial absorptions.

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung /
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung /
translated: they are embraced by emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness;

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung /
translated: they are embraced by the superknowledges;

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ; sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su bzung /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ; sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su bzung /
translated: they are embraced by the ten tathāgata powers, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha;

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su bzung na /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su bzung na /
translated: and they are embraced by the knowledge of all aspects up to and including the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bar ma dor nye zhor mi 'gyur bar rig @241a * //
analyzed: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bar ma dor nye zhor mi 'gyur bar rig @241a * //
translated: Subhūti, you should know that those bodhisattva great beings will not die an untimely death on the way to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: bar bya'o // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: bar bya'o // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar yang 'gyur te /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar yang 'gyur te /
translated: Subhūti, it is because it is like this:

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa yang yod /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa yang yod /
translated: “Bodhisattva great beings who have faith in unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: bzod pa yang yod /
analyzed: bzod pa yang yod /
translated: who have patience,

original: dga' ba yang yod /🔽rab tu dang ba yang yod /
analyzed: dga' ba yang yod / rab tu dang ba yang yod /
translated: who have joy,🔽who have clear faith,

original: lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod /🔽'dod pa yang yod /🔽mos pa yang yod /
analyzed: lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod / 'dod pa yang yod / mos pa yang yod /
translated: who have higher intention,🔽who have desire,🔽who have interest,

original: 'dun pa yang yod /🔽mi gtong pa yang yod /
analyzed: 'dun pa yang yod / mi gtong pa yang yod /
translated: who have aspiration,🔽who are not stingy,

original: brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba yang yod la /
analyzed: brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba yang yod la /
translated: who do not give up trying,

original: de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par 'gyur /
analyzed: de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par 'gyur /
translated: and who are embraced by the perfection of wisdom,

original: thabs mkhas pas yongs su zin par 'gyur /
analyzed: thabs mkhas pas yongs su zin par 'gyur /
translated: embraced by skillful means,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par 'gyur /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par 'gyur /
translated: embraced by the perfection of concentration, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of patience, the perfection of morality, and the perfection of giving,

original: de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su zin par 'gyur na /
analyzed: de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su zin par 'gyur na /
translated: In the same way, up to the knowledge of all aspects,🔽that bodhisattva mahāsattva does not fall to the śrāvaka level or the pratyekabuddha level.”

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ngo zhes bya ba ni ma tshang ba med pa'i khyad par lam gyi skad cig ma gnyis pa yin no //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ngo zhes bya ba ni ma tshang ba med pa'i khyad par lam gyi skad cig ma gnyis pa yin no //
translated: This is the second moment of the path of preparation.

original: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /🔽skyes bu lo brgya nyi shu lon pa gya ba rgas pa 'chal ba zhig yod la /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na / skyes bu lo brgya nyi shu lon pa gya ba rgas pa 'chal ba zhig yod la /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:

original: de'i lus la rlung ngam /🔽mkhris pa'am / bad kan nam /
analyzed: de'i lus la rlung ngam / mkhris pa'am / bad kan nam /
translated: There is a man who is one hundred and twenty years old, who is decrepit, aged, and feeble,

original: 'dus pa'i nad 'ga' zhig gis btab na /
analyzed: 'dus pa'i nad 'ga' zhig gis btab na /
translated: and he is afflicted by some kind of illness,🔽whether of wind,🔽bile, phlegm,🔽or a combination of them.

original: rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems /
translated: Subhūti, what do you think?

original: skyes bu de ma brtan par rang nyid kyis 'gro nus sam /
analyzed: skyes bu de ma brtan par rang nyid kyis 'gro nus sam /
translated: Can that man, without support, go by himself?”

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so //
translated: “No, Blessed One.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,🔽“Subhūti,

original: rab 'byor skyes bu de yang khri las cung zad ldang bar nus sam /
analyzed: rab 'byor skyes bu de yang khri las cung zad ldang bar nus sam /
translated: “Subhūti, would that man be able to get up from his bed?”

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: bcom ldan 'das de ni khri las ldang nus su lags kyang rgyang grags gcig gi bar du mchi bar mi nus te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de ni khri las ldang nus su lags kyang rgyang grags gcig gi bar du mchi bar mi nus te /
translated: “Blessed One, he would be able to get up from his bed, but he would not be able to walk even the distance of a single krośa.

original: de rgas pa de dang bro 'tshal bas nyams dmas pa'i slad du khri de las ldang nus su lags kyang des mchi mi nus so //
analyzed: de rgas pa de dang bro 'tshal bas nyams dmas pa'i slad du khri de las ldang nus su lags kyang des mchi mi nus so //
translated: Because of his old age and infirmity, he would be able to get up from his bed, but he would not be able to walk.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa yang yod /
analyzed: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa yang yod /
translated: “Subhūti, in the same way, bodhisattva great beings have faith in unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: bzod pa yang yod /
analyzed: bzod pa yang yod /
translated: they have patience,

original: dga' ba yang yod /🔽rab tu dang ba yang yod /
analyzed: dga' ba yang yod / rab tu dang ba yang yod /
translated: they have joy,🔽they have clear faith,

original: @241b lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod /
analyzed: @241b lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod /
translated: they have higher intention,

original: 'dod pa yang yod /🔽mos pa yang yod /
analyzed: 'dod pa yang yod / mos pa yang yod /
translated: they have desire,🔽they have interest,

original: 'dun pa yang yod /
analyzed: 'dun pa yang yod /
translated: they have aspiration,

original: mi gtong ba yang yod /
analyzed: mi gtong ba yang yod /
translated: they do not give up,

original: brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba yang yod mod kyi /
analyzed: brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba yang yod mod kyi /
translated: and they do not abandon their efforts.

original: de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /
translated: They are not embraced by the perfection of wisdom.

original: thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung /
translated: They are not embraced by skill in means.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /
translated: They are not embraced by the perfection of concentration, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of patience, the perfection of morality, or the perfection of generosity.

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su ma bzung /
translated: They are not embraced by inner emptiness, up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pas yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pas yongs su ma bzung /
translated: They are not embraced by the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam gyis yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam gyis yongs su ma bzung /
translated: They are not embraced by the right efforts, legs of miraculous power, faculties, powers, limbs of awakening, or path.

original: tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /
translated: the immeasurables, the dhyānas, the formless absorptions, and the noble truths have not been taken up,

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /
translated: and emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness have not been taken up,

original: stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung na /🔽rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' de ni bar ma dor nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung na / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' de ni bar ma dor nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: and the ten powers, the fearlessnesses, and the distinct attributes of a buddha have not been taken up,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'gyur bar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'gyur bar rig par bya'o //
translated: then, Subhūti, you should know that this bodhisattva will fall to the śrāvaka level or the pratyekabuddha level.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang / thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang / de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su ma bzung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang / thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang / de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su ma bzung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is because they have not been taken up by the perfection of wisdom, they have not been taken up by skillful means, and they have not been taken up by up to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:

original: mi na tshod kyis lo brgya nyi shu lon pa gya ba rgas pa 'cha' ba de rlung ngam /
analyzed: mi na tshod kyis lo brgya nyi shu lon pa gya ba rgas pa 'cha' ba de rlung ngam /
translated: For example, a man who is a hundred and twenty years old, who is old, aged, feeble, and decrepit, is afflicted by wind,🔽bile, phlegm,

original: mkhris pa'am / bad kan nam /🔽'dus pa'i nad kyis btab par gyur la /
analyzed: mkhris pa'am / bad kan nam / 'dus pa'i nad kyis btab par gyur la /
translated: or a combination of these.

original: de khri las ldang bar 'dod na /
analyzed: de khri las ldang bar 'dod na /
translated: If he wants to get up from his seat,

original: de la skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa gnyis kyis glo g-yas g-yon nas bzung ste brten nas 'di skad du /
analyzed: de la skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa gnyis kyis glo g-yas g-yon nas bzung ste brten nas 'di skad du /
translated: two strong men would hold him under the armpits and support him, saying,

original: kye skyes bu khyod ci dga' ba'i don du gar 'dod par 'dong ngo //
analyzed: kye skyes bu khyod ci dga' ba'i don du gar 'dod par 'dong ngo //
translated: Hey, man, for whatever you want, for whatever you like, we will go wherever you want to go.

original: khyod ni bdag cag gis gzung gi gnas der ma phyin gyi bar du lam der bar ma dor rdeg 'cha' bas 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro zhes bsgo ba de bzhin du /
analyzed: khyod ni bdag cag gis gzung gi gnas der ma phyin gyi bar du lam der bar ma dor rdeg 'cha' bas 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro zhes bsgo ba de bzhin du /
translated: We will support you, so you have nothing to fear from stumbling on the way until you get there.

original: rab 'byor byang chub sems @242a * //
analyzed: rab 'byor byang chub sems @242a * //
translated: In the same way, Subhūti, for a bodhisattva mahāsattva who has faith,🔽patience,🔽joy,🔽and vigor for unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,🔽and who has the perfection of wisdom and skillful means,🔽and who has the perfection of wisdom and skillful means,🔽and who has the perfection of wisdom and skillful means,

original: dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa yang yod /🔽bzod pa yang yod /
analyzed: dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa yang yod / bzod pa yang yod /
translated: and who has the perfection of wisdom and skillful means,🔽and who has the perfection of wisdom and skillful means,🔽and who has the perfection of wisdom and skillful means,🔽and who has the perfection of wisdom and skillful means,🔽and who has the perfection of wisdom and skillful means,🔽and who has the perfection of wisdom and skillful means,🔽and who has the perfection of wisdom and skillful means,🔽and who has the perfection of wisdom and skillful means,🔽and who has the perfection of wisdom and skillful means,🔽and who has the perfection of wisdom and skillful means,🔽and who has the perfection of wisdom and skillful means,🔽and who has the perfection of wisdom and skillful means,🔽and who has the perfection of wisdom and skillful means,🔽and who has the perfection of wisdom and skillful means,🔽and who has the perfection of wisdom and skillful means,🔽and who has the perfection of wisdom and skillful means,🔽and who has the perfection of wisdom and skillful means,🔽and who has the perfection of wisdom and skillful means,🔽and who has the perfection of wisdom and skillful means,🔽and who has the perfection of wisdom and skillful means,🔽and who has the perfection of wisdom and skillful means,🔽and who has the perfection of wisdom and skillful means,🔽and who has the perfection of wisdom and skillful means,🔽and who has the perfection of wisdom and skillful means,🔽and who has the perfection of wisdom and skillful means,

original: dga' ba yang yod /
analyzed: dga' ba yang yod /
translated: and

original: rab tu dang ba yang yod /
analyzed: rab tu dang ba yang yod /
translated: They have faith,

original: lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod /
analyzed: lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod /
translated: they have higher intention,

original: 'dod pa yang yod /🔽mos pa yang yod /
analyzed: 'dod pa yang yod / mos pa yang yod /
translated: they have desire,🔽they have interest,

original: 'dun pa yang yod /
analyzed: 'dun pa yang yod /
translated: they have aspiration,

original: mi gtong ba yang yod /
analyzed: mi gtong ba yang yod /
translated: they do not give up,

original: brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba yang yod la /
analyzed: brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba yang yod la /
translated: and they do not abandon their perseverance.

original: de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /
analyzed: de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /
translated: Moreover, they are held by the perfection of wisdom,

original: thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung /
analyzed: thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung /
translated: they are held by skillful means,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /🔽brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /
translated: they are held by the perfection of concentration,🔽they are held by the perfection of perseverance,

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /
translated: they are held by the perfection of patience,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /
translated: they are held by the perfection of morality,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /
translated: and they are held by the perfection of generosity.

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su bzung na /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su bzung na /
translated: They are held by inner emptiness, outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bar ma dor nye zhor mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bar ma dor nye zhor mi 'gyur te /
translated: “Subhūti, that bodhisattva great being will not be lost in the meantime.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni 'di lta ste /
translated: That bodhisattva great being will be able to reach that place, namely,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi gnas der phyin par nus so //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi gnas der phyin par nus so //
translated: unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ; thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ; thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are not separated from the perfection of wisdom and skillful means.”

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti then asked,

original: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /
translated: “Blessed One, how is it that sons of good family and daughters of good family in the Bodhisattva Vehicle, not taken hold of by the perfection of wisdom,

original: thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung na /🔽nyan thos kyi sa 'am /
analyzed: thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung na / nyan thos kyi sa 'am /
translated: and not taken hold of by skillful means,🔽fall to the śrāvaka level

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba lags /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba lags /
translated: or the pratyekabuddha level?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One replied,🔽“Subhūti, it is because those sons of good family and daughters of good family have not been taken hold of by the perfection of wisdom and skillful means.

original: rab 'byor khyod de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don de 'dri bar sems pa legs so legs so //
analyzed: rab 'byor khyod de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don de 'dri bar sems pa legs so legs so //
translated: “Subhūti, it is excellent, excellent that you have thought to ask the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One about this matter.

original: rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thog mar sbyin pa gang gtong ba de yang bdag dang bdag gir ltung ba'i sems kyis gtong /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thog mar sbyin pa gang gtong ba de yang bdag dang bdag gir ltung ba'i sems kyis gtong /
translated: “Subhūti, here, when a bodhisattva great being first gives a gift, he gives it with a thought that falls into the view of ‘I’ and ‘mine.’

original: tshul khrims gang srung ba dang / bzod pa gang sgom pa dang / brtson 'grus gang rtsom pa dang / bsam gtan gang la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / shes rab gang sgom par byed pa de yang bdag @242b dang bdag gir ltung ba'i sems kyis sgom par byed do //
analyzed: tshul khrims gang srung ba dang / bzod pa gang sgom pa dang / brtson 'grus gang rtsom pa dang / bsam gtan gang la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / shes rab gang sgom par byed pa de yang bdag @242b dang bdag gir ltung ba'i sems kyis sgom par byed do //
translated: When he guards morality, when he cultivates patience, when he makes an effort, when he becomes absorbed in concentration, and when he cultivates wisdom, he cultivates it with a thought that falls into the view of ‘I’ and ‘mine.’

original: de sbyin pa yongs su gtong pa'i tshe 'di snyam du sems te /🔽bdag ni sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo //
analyzed: de sbyin pa yongs su gtong pa'i tshe 'di snyam du sems te / bdag ni sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo //
translated: When he gives a gift, he thinks,🔽‘I am giving a gift.

original: sbyin pa ni 'di lta bu zhig yongs su gtong ngo //
analyzed: sbyin pa ni 'di lta bu zhig yongs su gtong ngo //
translated: I am giving such and such a gift.’

original: 'di dag la sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa'o //🔽bdag ni tshul khrims yongs su srung ngo //
analyzed: 'di dag la sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa'o // bdag ni tshul khrims yongs su srung ngo //
translated: I am giving gifts to them.🔽I am protecting morality.

original: tshul khrims ni 'di lta bu zhig srung ngo //
analyzed: tshul khrims ni 'di lta bu zhig srung ngo //
translated: I am protecting this kind of morality.

original: bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o //🔽bdag ni bzod pa sgom pa'o //
analyzed: bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o // bdag ni bzod pa sgom pa'o //
translated: I am moral.🔽I am cultivating patience.

original: bdag ni bzod pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o //🔽bdag ni bzod pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: bdag ni bzod pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o // bdag ni bzod pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: I am perfecting patience.🔽I am patient.

original: bdag ni brtson 'grus rtsom mo //🔽brtson 'grus ni 'di lta bu zhig rtsom mo //
analyzed: bdag ni brtson 'grus rtsom mo // brtson 'grus ni 'di lta bu zhig rtsom mo //
translated: I am undertaking perseverance.🔽I am undertaking this kind of perseverance.

original: bdag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: bdag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o //
translated: I am persevering.

original: bdag ni bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug pa'o //🔽bdag ni bsam gtan pa'o //
analyzed: bdag ni bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug pa'o // bdag ni bsam gtan pa'o //
translated: I am absorbed in concentration.🔽I am concentrated.

original: bdag ni bsam gtan dang ldan pa'o //🔽bdag ni shes rab sgom mo //🔽shes rab ni 'di lta bu zhig sgom mo //
analyzed: bdag ni bsam gtan dang ldan pa'o // bdag ni shes rab sgom mo // shes rab ni 'di lta bu zhig sgom mo //
translated: I am concentrated.🔽I am cultivating wisdom.🔽I am cultivating this kind of wisdom.

original: bdag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o snyam nas /🔽de sbyin pa des rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: bdag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o snyam nas / de sbyin pa des rlom sems su byed do //
translated: I am wise.🔽He becomes conceited because of that giving.

original: sbyin pa rlom sems su byed /
analyzed: sbyin pa rlom sems su byed /
translated: He becomes conceited about giving.

original: bdag ni sbyin pa byed pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed /
analyzed: bdag ni sbyin pa byed pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed /
translated: He conceives of himself as the one who gives.

original: de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / shes rab des rlom sems su byed de //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / shes rab des rlom sems su byed de //
translated: In the same way, he conceives of himself in relation to morality, patience, perseverance, concentration, and wisdom.

original: shes rab rlom sems su byed /
analyzed: shes rab rlom sems su byed /
translated: He conceives of wisdom,

original: bdag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed do //
analyzed: bdag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed do //
translated: and he conceives of himself as the one who has wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa de dag med de /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa de dag med de /
translated: Because those conceptual thoughts do not exist in the perfection of generosity,

original: ring du song ba ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ring du song ba ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the perfection of generosity has gone far away.

original: de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med /🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la med /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la med /
translated: In the same way, they do not exist in the perfection of morality,🔽in the perfection of patience,

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med /
translated: in the perfection of perseverance,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med /
translated: in the perfection of concentration,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa de dag med de /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa de dag med de /
translated: and in the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: ring du song ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ring du song ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the perfection of wisdom is the far shore.

original: de ltar yin yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa des tshu rol yang mi shes /
analyzed: de ltar yin yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa des tshu rol yang mi shes /
translated: Even though that is the case, that person who is a bodhisattva vehicle practitioner does not know the near shore,

original: pha rol yang mi shes te /
analyzed: pha rol yang mi shes te /
translated: does not know the far shore,

original: de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /🔽tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas @243a * //
analyzed: de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas @243a * //
translated: is not held by the perfection of giving,

original: yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: yongs su ma bzung /
translated: is not held by the perfection of morality, perfection of patience, perfection of perseverance, perfection of concentration, and perfection of wisdom,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su ma bzung bas /🔽nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su ma bzung bas / nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: is not held by the knowledge of all aspects,🔽and falls to the śrāvaka level

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ste /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ste /
translated: or the pratyekabuddha level,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ngo //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ngo //
translated: and does not emerge in the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i thabs mi mkhas par 'gyur ba yin zhe na /🔽rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i thabs mi mkhas par 'gyur ba yin zhe na / rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: “Subhūti, how do bodhisattvas become unskilled in means?

original: rigs kyi bu mo gang thog mar thabs med par sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo gang thog mar thabs med par sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo //
translated: Subhūti, it is like this: bodhisattva great beings, sons or daughters of good family, who, from the very beginning, practice generosity without skillful means,

original: thabs med par tshul khrims srung /
analyzed: thabs med par tshul khrims srung /
translated: who practice discipline without skillful means,

original: thabs med par bzod pa sgom /
analyzed: thabs med par bzod pa sgom /
translated: who practice patience without skillful means,

original: thabs med par brtson 'grus rtsom /
analyzed: thabs med par brtson 'grus rtsom /
translated: who practice perseverance without skillful means,

original: thabs med par bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug / thabs med par shes rab sgom zhing de 'di snyam du sems te /
analyzed: thabs med par bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug / thabs med par shes rab sgom zhing de 'di snyam du sems te /
translated: who practice concentration without skillful means, and who practice wisdom without skillful means, think like this:

original: bdag ni sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo //
analyzed: bdag ni sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo //
translated: ‘I am practicing generosity.

original: sbyin pa ni 'di yongs su gtong ngo //🔽bdag ni tshul khrims srung ngo //
analyzed: sbyin pa ni 'di yongs su gtong ngo // bdag ni tshul khrims srung ngo //
translated: I am giving this gift.🔽I am practicing discipline.

original: tshul khrims ni 'di srung ngo //🔽bdag ni bzod pa sgom mo //
analyzed: tshul khrims ni 'di srung ngo // bdag ni bzod pa sgom mo //
translated: I am observing this discipline.🔽I am practicing patience.

original: bzod pa ni 'di sgom mo //🔽bdag ni brtson 'grus rtsom mo //
analyzed: bzod pa ni 'di sgom mo // bdag ni brtson 'grus rtsom mo //
translated: I am cultivating this patience.🔽I am practicing perseverance.

original: brtson 'grus ni 'di rtsom mo //
analyzed: brtson 'grus ni 'di rtsom mo //
translated: I am undertaking this perseverance.

original: bdag ni bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug go //
analyzed: bdag ni bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug go //
translated: I am entering into the meditative concentrations.

original: bsam gtan ni 'di dag la snyoms par 'jug go //
analyzed: bsam gtan ni 'di dag la snyoms par 'jug go //
translated: I am entering into these meditative concentrations.

original: bdag ni shes rab sgom mo //
analyzed: bdag ni shes rab sgom mo //
translated: I am cultivating wisdom.🔽I am cultivating this wisdom.

original: shes rab ni 'di sgom mo zhes de sbyin pa rlom sems su byed de /🔽sbyin pas rlom sems su byed /
analyzed: shes rab ni 'di sgom mo zhes de sbyin pa rlom sems su byed de / sbyin pas rlom sems su byed /
translated: They become conceited about generosity.🔽They become conceited because of generosity.

original: bdag ni sbyin pa byed pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed /🔽tshul khrims rlom sems su byed /
analyzed: bdag ni sbyin pa byed pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed / tshul khrims rlom sems su byed /
translated: They become conceited, thinking, ‘I am generous.’🔽They become conceited about discipline.

original: tshul khrims kyis rlom sems su byed /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyis rlom sems su byed /
translated: They become conceited because of discipline.

original: bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed /🔽bzod pa rlom sems su byed /
analyzed: bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed / bzod pa rlom sems su byed /
translated: They become conceited, thinking, ‘I am disciplined.’🔽They become conceited about patience.

original: bzod pas rlom sems su byed /
analyzed: bzod pas rlom sems su byed /
translated: They become conceited because of patience.

original: bdag ni bzod pa dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed /🔽brtson 'grus rlom sems su byed /
analyzed: bdag ni bzod pa dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed / brtson 'grus rlom sems su byed /
translated: They become conceited, thinking, ‘I am patient.’🔽They become conceited about perseverance.

original: brtson 'grus kyis rlom sems su byed /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyis rlom sems su byed /
translated: They become conceited because of perseverance.

original: bdag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed /🔽bsam gtan rlom sems su byed /
analyzed: bdag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed / bsam gtan rlom sems su byed /
translated: They become conceited, thinking, ‘I am persevering.’🔽They become conceited about meditative stability.

original: bsam gtan gyis rlom sems su byed /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyis rlom sems su byed /
translated: They become conceited because of meditative stability.

original: bdag ni bsam gtan dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed /🔽shes rab rlom sems su byed /
analyzed: bdag ni bsam gtan dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed / shes rab rlom sems su byed /
translated: They become conceited about concentration,🔽they become conceited about wisdom,

original: shes rab kyis rlom sems su byed /
analyzed: shes rab kyis rlom sems su byed /
translated: they become conceited about having wisdom,

original: bdag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed pa ste /
analyzed: bdag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed pa ste /
translated: they become conceited about being endowed with wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'dis ji ltar rnam par brtags pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la med pa'i phyir @243b ro ;
analyzed: 'dis ji ltar rnam par brtags pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la med pa'i phyir @243b ro ;
translated: Because the conceptualization that they have imagined does not exist in the perfection of generosity.

original: / de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽de ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: / de ci'i phyir zhe na / de ni 'di lta ste /
translated: Why is that?

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ring du song ba'i phyir ro //🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ring du song ba'i phyir ro // 'di lta ste /
