analyzed: rab 'byor chos thams cad ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngang tshul can te /
translated: “Subhūti, all dharmas have the nature of the result of once-returner.

original: de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o //
analyzed: de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o //
translated: They do not pass beyond that nature.

original: rab 'byor chos thams cad ni @256a * //
analyzed: rab 'byor chos thams cad ni @256a * //
translated: “Subhūti, all dharmas have the nature of the result of non-returner.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngang tshul can te /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngang tshul can te /
translated: They are the nature of the fruit of non-returning.

original: de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o //
analyzed: de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o //
translated: They do not pass beyond that nature.

original: rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub kyi ngang tshul can te /
analyzed: rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub kyi ngang tshul can te /
translated: Subhūti, all phenomena are the nature of the fruit of a worthy one and of a pratyekabuddha’s awakening.

original: de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o //
analyzed: de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o //
translated: They do not pass beyond that nature.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: rab 'byor de rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub nyid kyang shin tu med na /
analyzed: rab 'byor de rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub nyid kyang shin tu med na /
translated: Subhūti, it is because the stream enterer, the once-returner, the non-returner, the worthy one, and the pratyekabuddha’s awakening itself are utterly nonexistent.

original: de la 'ong ba'am 'gro ba lta ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: de la 'ong ba'am 'gro ba lta ga la 'gyur /
translated: How could there be coming or going in that?

original: rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ngang tshul can te /
analyzed: rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ngang tshul can te /
translated: Subhūti, all phenomena are the nature of unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o //
analyzed: de dag ni ngang tshul de las mi 'da'o //
translated: They do not pass beyond that nature.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: rab 'byor bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub nyid kyang shin tu med na /
analyzed: rab 'byor bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub nyid kyang shin tu med na /
translated: Subhūti, it is because unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening itself is utterly nonexistent.

original: de la 'ong ba'am 'gro ba lta ga la 'gyur /
analyzed: de la 'ong ba'am 'gro ba lta ga la 'gyur /
translated: How could there be coming or going in that?

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la su zhig mos par 'gyur /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la su zhig mos par 'gyur /
translated: “Blessed One, who will believe in this profound perfection of wisdom?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyi dbang du byas nas sngon spyad par gyur pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyi dbang du byas nas sngon spyad par gyur pa /
translated: “Subhūti, those bodhisattva great beings who, in relation to the victors of the past, have practiced in the past for unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: sngon gyi rgyal ba la dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par gyur pa /
analyzed: sngon gyi rgyal ba la dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par gyur pa /
translated: who have ripened their roots of virtue in relation to the victors of the past,

original: sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po la bsnyen bkur bar gyur pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po la bsnyen bkur bar gyur pa /
translated: who have served many hundreds of thousands of quintillions of buddhas,🔽who have been taken up by spiritual friends—they will believe in this profound perfection of wisdom.”

original: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni rten gyi mdzad pa ste /
analyzed: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni rten gyi mdzad pa ste /
translated: This is the activity of the support.

original: 'di dag gis ni byed pa'i mtshan nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'di dag gis ni byed pa'i mtshan nyid yin no //
translated: These are the characteristics of the agent.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti said:

original: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de dag gi rtags dang rnam pa dang mtshan ma dang rang bzhin ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de dag gi rtags dang rnam pa dang mtshan ma dang rang bzhin ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur /
translated: “Blessed One, what will be the signs, aspects, marks, and nature of those bodhisattva great beings who will understand this profound perfection of wisdom?”

original: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa /🔽rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni 'dod chags rnam par gsal bas dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni 'dod chags rnam par gsal bas dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro //
translated: Having said that, the Blessed One said to the venerable Subhūti:🔽“Subhūti, those bodhisattva great beings will have a nature that is isolated from the clarity of desire.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni zhe sdang dang gti mug rnam par gsal bas dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa las dben pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni zhe sdang dang gti mug rnam par gsal bas dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa las dben pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no //
translated: Those bodhisattva great beings will have a nature that is isolated from the clarity of anger and ignorance.” This is the nature of isolation from the afflictions.

original: rab 'byor @256b byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni 'dod chags kyi rtags kyis dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro //🔽rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni zhe sdang dang gti mug gi rtags kyis dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni de'i rtags kyis dben pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no //🔽rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni 'dod chags kyi mtshan ma dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor @256b byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni 'dod chags kyi rtags kyis dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro // rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni zhe sdang dang gti mug gi rtags kyis dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni de'i rtags kyis dben pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no // rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni 'dod chags kyi mtshan ma dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro //
translated: “Subhūti, those bodhisattva great beings will be the nature of being isolated from the signs of greed.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni zhe sdang dang gti mug gi mtshan mas dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni de'i mtshan mas dben pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni zhe sdang dang gti mug gi mtshan mas dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni de'i mtshan mas dben pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no //
translated: “Subhūti, those bodhisattva great beings will be the nature of being isolated from the signs of hatred and confusion.”🔽“Subhūti, those bodhisattva great beings will be the nature of being isolated from the signs of greed.🔽Those bodhisattva great beings will be the nature of being isolated from the signs of hatred and confusion.”

original: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ba de dag ni 'dod chags dang 'dod chags med pas rnam par dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ba de dag ni 'dod chags dang 'dod chags med pas rnam par dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro //
translated: “Subhūti, those bodhisattva great beings who will believe in this deep perfection of wisdom will be of the nature of being isolated from attachment and nonattachment.

original: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni zhe sdang dang zhe sdang med pa dang gti mug dang gti mug med pas rnam par dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni zhe sdang dang zhe sdang med pa dang gti mug dang gti mug med pas rnam par dben pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro //
translated: “Subhūti, those bodhisattva great beings will be of the nature of being isolated from anger and nonanger, and from confusion and nonconfusion.🔽”

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de dag gi ngang tshul ji lta bur 'gyur /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de dag gi ngang tshul ji lta bur 'gyur /
translated: “Blessed One, what will be the character of those bodhisattva great beings who will understand this deep perfection of wisdom?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,🔽“Subhūti, those bodhisattva great beings who will understand this deep perfection of wisdom will be of the nature of being isolated from form, and from feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness.

original: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su shes par 'gyur ba de dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su shes par 'gyur ba de dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can du 'gyur ro //
translated: “Subhūti, those bodhisattva great beings who will understand this deep perfection of wisdom will have the disposition for the knowledge of all aspects.🔽”

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can de dag sems can thams cad kyi rten bgyid pa lags sam /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can de dag sems can thams cad kyi rten bgyid pa lags sam /
translated: “Lord, are those bodhisattva great beings who have the disposition for the knowledge of all aspects a support for all beings?🔽”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor de de bzhin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor de de bzhin no //
translated: “Subhūti, it is so.

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: It is just as you have said.🔽Those bodhisattva great beings who have the disposition for the knowledge of all aspects and will believe in this deep perfection of wisdom will be a support for all beings.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ba de dag ni sems can thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur ba yin no zhes
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngang tshul can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ba de dag ni sems can thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur ba yin no zhes
translated: Those bodhisattva great beings who have the character of the knowledge of all aspects and who will aspire to this deep perfection of wisdom will be the support of all sentient beings.”🔽🔽

original: bya ba ni mi mthun pa dang gnyen po'i phyogs dag gis dben pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: bya ba ni mi mthun pa dang gnyen po'i phyogs dag gis dben pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
translated: Action is the nature of being devoid of the discordant classes and their antidotes.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti said:🔽Blessed One,

original: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po @257a * //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po @257a * //
translated: those bodhisattva great beings

original: gang gis sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha 'di 'tshal yang de las sems can dang sems can du gdags pa mi dmigs pa de dag ni dka' ba bgyid par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gis sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha 'di 'tshal yang de las sems can dang sems can du gdags pa mi dmigs pa de dag ni dka' ba bgyid par 'gyur ro //
translated: who, although they have donned this armor with the thought, “I will lead all sentient beings to complete nirvāṇa,” do not apprehend sentient beings or the designation of sentient beings—they are the ones who do what is difficult.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said:

original: rab 'byor de de bzhin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor de de bzhin no //
translated: Subhūti, that is so!

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: That is so!

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o zhes go cha 'di bgos pa de dag ni dka' ba byed par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o zhes go cha 'di bgos pa de dag ni dka' ba byed par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Those bodhisattva great beings who have donned this armor with the thought, “I will lead all sentient beings to complete nirvāṇa,” they are the ones who do what is difficult.

original: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni gzugs dang 'brel ba ma yin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni gzugs dang 'brel ba ma yin te /
translated: Subhūti, that armor of the bodhisattva great beings is not connected with form.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: rab 'byor gzugs kyang shin tu med la /
analyzed: rab 'byor gzugs kyang shin tu med la /
translated: Su­bhūti, it is because physical forms are absolutely nonexistent,

original: byang chub sems dpa' yang med /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yang med /
translated: bodhisattvas are absolutely nonexistent,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas /
translated: and the armor of the bodhisattvas is absolutely nonexistent.

original: rab 'byor de'i phyir go cha de ni gzugs dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor de'i phyir go cha de ni gzugs dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, Su­bhūti, it is said that this armor is not related to physical forms.

original: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te /
translated: “Su­bhūti, this armor of great bodhisattva beings is not related to feelings, perceptions, formative predispositions, and consciousness.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: rab 'byor rnam par shes pa yan shin tu med la /
analyzed: rab 'byor rnam par shes pa yan shin tu med la /
translated: Su­bhūti, it is because consciousness is absolutely nonexistent,

original: byang chub sems dpa' yang med /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yang med /
translated: bodhisattvas are absolutely nonexistent,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas /
translated: and the armor of the bodhisattvas is absolutely nonexistent.

original: rab 'byor de'i phyir go cha de ni rnam par shes pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor de'i phyir go cha de ni rnam par shes pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, Su­bhūti, it is said that this armor is not related to consciousness.

original: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'am /
analyzed: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'am /
translated: “Subhūti, that armor of bodhisattva great beings is not related to the aggregates,

original: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag dang 'brel pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag dang 'brel pa ma yin te /
translated: the constituents, the sense fields, or dependent origination.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'am /
analyzed: rab 'byor phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'am /
translated: Subhūti, the aggregates, the constituents, the sense fields, and dependent origination

original: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag kyang shin tu med la /
analyzed: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag kyang shin tu med la /
translated: are utterly nonexistent.

original: byang chub sems dpa' yang med /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yang med /
translated: There are no bodhisattvas,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas /
translated: and there is no armor of bodhisattvas.

original: rab 'byor de'i phyir go cha de ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang 'brel pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rab 'byor de'i phyir go cha de ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang 'brel pa ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, Subhūti, that armor is not related to dependent origination

original: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag dang 'brel pa ma yin no zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag dang 'brel pa ma yin no zhes bya'o //
translated: and is not related to the factors of dependent origination.”🔽“Subhūti, that armor of bodhisattva great beings is not related to the perfection of giving,🔽the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, or the perfection of wisdom.

original: rab 'byor de bzhin du go cha de ni bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / skye ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor de bzhin du go cha de ni bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / skye ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang /
translated: a sentient being, a living being, one who is born, one who is nourished, a human being, a person, one who lives, one who makes live, one who acts, one who feels,🔽one who knows, or one who sees, and so on at length, up to

original: shes pa po dang / mthong ba po dang / 'brel pa ma yin pa nas rgyas par rab 'byor @257b go cha de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang 'brel pa ma yin te /
analyzed: shes pa po dang / mthong ba po dang / 'brel pa ma yin pa nas rgyas par rab 'byor @257b go cha de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang 'brel pa ma yin te /
translated: Subhūti, that armor is not connected with the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shin tu med la /
analyzed: rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shin tu med la /
translated: Subhūti, the knowledge of all aspects is utterly nonexistent,

original: byang chub sems dpa' yang med /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yang med /
translated: a bodhisattva is nonexistent,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas /
translated: and a bodhisattva’s armor is nonexistent.🔽Therefore, Subhūti, that armor of a bodhisattva great being is said not to be connected with the knowledge of all aspects.”🔽“Lord, if the knowledge of all aspects is utterly nonexistent,🔽a bodhisattva is utterly nonexistent,

original: rab 'byor de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o //
translated: and a bodhisattva’s armor is utterly nonexistent,🔽how, Lord, can a bodhisattva who has set out for unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening don the great armor?🔽Lord, how can a bodhisattva who has set out for unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening don the great armor?”🔽“Subhūti, here a bodhisattva great being who has set out for unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening dons the great armor for the sake of bringing beings to maturity.

original: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa gang gis sems can thams cad bdag gis yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes de ltar go cha bgos pa de dag gi go
analyzed: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa gang gis sems can thams cad bdag gis yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes de ltar go cha bgos pa de dag gi go
translated: “Subhūti, the armor of those bodhisattva great beings who practice this profound perfection of wisdom, thinking, ‘I must lead all sentient beings to complete nirvāṇa,’

original: cha ni chos thams cad dang 'brel pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni dka' ba nyid kyi ngo bo yin no //
analyzed: cha ni chos thams cad dang 'brel pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni dka' ba nyid kyi ngo bo yin no //
translated: is not connected with any dharma.” This is the essence of difficulty.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /🔽bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha 'tshal ba des nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha 'tshal ba des nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i mtshan nyid du dogs par mi bgyi ste /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i mtshan nyid du dogs par mi bgyi ste /
translated: “Blessed One, the bodhisattva great beings who don the armor, thinking, ‘I must lead all sentient beings to complete nirvāṇa,’ should not fear the defining characteristics of the śrāvaka and pratyekabuddha levels.

original: bcom ldan 'das gang sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes de ltar go cha 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gang sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes de ltar go cha 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: Blessed One, the bodhisattva great beings who don the armor with the thought, “I will lead all sentient beings to complete nirvāṇa,” are they not to be praised?

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba'i gnas dang skabs ma mchis te /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba'i gnas dang skabs ma mchis te /
translated: Blessed One, it is impossible for a bodhisattva great being who dons the armor with the thought, “I will liberate all sentient beings from suffering,” to fall to the śrāvaka level or the pratyekabuddha level.

original: de ni gnas ma mchis so //
analyzed: de ni gnas ma mchis so //
translated: That is not possible.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?🔽Blessed One, it is because the bodhisattva great beings do not don the armor for the sake of a limited number of sentient beings.”

original: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa mtshams bcad de sems can rnams kyi don du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni mtha' gcig tu nges pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa mtshams bcad de sems can rnams kyi don du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni mtha' gcig tu nges pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no //
translated: This is the essence of the single mode.

original: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said to the venerable Subhūti,

original: rab 'byor khyod kyis don gyi dbang gang zhig mthong nas de skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa des nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: rab 'byor khyod kyis don gyi dbang gang zhig mthong nas de skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa des nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: What is the meaning that you have seen, Subhuti, that you say: The Bodhisattva, the great being, who is armed with the great armor, who courses in the perfection of wisdom, should not stand in the level of Disciple or Pratyekabuddha?

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gzhan gnyis su dogs par mi bya'o zhes smras /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gzhan gnyis su dogs par mi bya'o zhes smras /
translated: What is the meaning that you have seen, Subhūti, that you say, The bodhisattva great being who is armed with the great armor and practices this deep perfection of wisdom should not fear the other two stations, the śrāvaka level or the pratyekabuddha level?

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can nyung zad nyi tshe zhig gi slad du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags te /🔽bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems @258a * //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can nyung zad nyi tshe zhig gi slad du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags te / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems @258a * //
translated: Blessed One, it is because the bodhisattva great being does not don the armor for the sake of a few sentient beings, a mere handful.

original: dpa' chen pos ni sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi slad du go cha 'tshal to //
analyzed: dpa' chen pos ni sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi slad du go cha 'tshal to //
translated: Blessed One, the bodhisattva great being dons the armor for the sake of all sentient beings, for the sake of the knowledge of a knower of all aspects.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor de de bzhin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor de de bzhin no //
translated: Subhūti, it is so!

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: It is just as you have said.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i don du go cha chen po bgos pa ma yin no //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i don du go cha chen po bgos pa ma yin no //
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings do not don the great armor for the sake of a few sentient beings.🔽Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings don the armor for the sake of all sentient beings passing into complete nirvāṇa and for the sake of the knowledge of a knower of all aspects.”

original: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi don du go cha bgos so zhes bya ba ni ched du bya ba'i ngo bo nyid yin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi don du go cha bgos so zhes bya ba ni ched du bya ba'i ngo bo nyid yin no //
translated: This is the essence of the purpose.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa yin te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa yin te /
translated: “Blessed One, the perfection of wisdom is profound.

original: de ni sus kyang bsgom par mi bgyi ci yang bsgom par mi bgyi /
analyzed: de ni sus kyang bsgom par mi bgyi ci yang bsgom par mi bgyi /
translated: It is not to be cultivated by anyone at all, nor is it to be cultivated as anything at all,

original: ji ltar yang bsgom par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: ji ltar yang bsgom par mi bgyi'o //
translated: nor is it to be cultivated in any way at all.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la gang bsgom par bgyi ba'am bsgom pa gang lags pa'am gang gis bsgom par bgyi ba'i chos gang yongs su grub par dmigs su ma mchis te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la gang bsgom par bgyi ba'am bsgom pa gang lags pa'am gang gis bsgom par bgyi ba'i chos gang yongs su grub par dmigs su ma mchis te /
translated: Blessed One, in this profound perfection of wisdom, no dharma whatsoever is apprehended that could be cultivated, that is cultivated, or that cultivates.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste /
translated: Blessed One, it is like this:

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni nam mkha' bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni nam mkha' bsgom pa'o //
translated: cultivating the perfection of wisdom is cultivating space.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste /
translated: Blessed One, it is like this:

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni chos thams cad bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni chos thams cad bsgom pa'o //
translated: cultivating the perfection of wisdom is cultivating all dharmas.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste /
translated: Blessed One, it is like this:

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni ma mchis pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni ma mchis pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: cultivating the perfection of wisdom is cultivating non-existence.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste /
translated: Blessed One, it is like this:

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: cultivating the perfection of wisdom is cultivating non-grasping.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste /
translated: Blessed One, it is like this:

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: This cultivation of the perfection of wisdom is the cultivation of non-cultivation.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said:

original: rab 'byor 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di lta ste /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gang bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa yin /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gang bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa yin /
translated: This cultivation of the perfection of wisdom is the non-cultivation of what is cultivated.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti said:

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste /
translated: Lord, it is like this:

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzugs bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzugs bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa'o //
translated: This cultivation of the perfection of wisdom is the non-cultivation of the cultivation of form.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par @258b mi bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par @258b mi bsgom pa'o //
translated: This cultivation of the perfection of wisdom is the non-cultivation of the cultivation of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni bdag bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni bdag bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa'o //
translated: This cultivation of the perfection of wisdom is the non-cultivation of the cultivation of a self.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed ba po dang / tshor ba po dang /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed ba po dang / tshor ba po dang /
translated: This cultivation of the perfection of wisdom is not the cultivation of a being, a living being, a creature, one born, one nourished, a man, an individual, one who lives, a person, a human being, one who does, one who feels,

original: shes ba po dang / mthong ba po bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: shes ba po dang / mthong ba po bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa'o //
translated: one who knows, or one who sees.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste /
translated: Blessed One, this cultivation of the perfection of wisdom is not the cultivation of form,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa'o //🔽bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa'o // bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste /
translated: Blessed One, this cultivation of the perfection of wisdom is not the cultivation of the perfection of generosity.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa'o //🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa'o // 'di lta ste /
translated: Blessed One, this cultivation of the perfection of wisdom is not the cultivation of the perfection of moral discipline.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa'o //
translated: This cultivation of the perfection of wisdom is not the cultivation of the perfection of patience.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa'o //
translated: This cultivation of the perfection of wisdom is the non-cultivation of the cultivation of the perfection of perseverance.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa'o //
translated: This cultivation of the perfection of wisdom is the non-cultivation of the cultivation of the perfection of concentration.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa'o ;
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa'o ;
translated: This cultivation of the perfection of wisdom is the non-cultivation of the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom.

original: /'di lta ste /
analyzed: /'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa'o //
translated: This cultivation of the perfection of wisdom is the non-cultivation of the cultivation of inner emptiness.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa'o //
translated: This cultivation of the perfection of wisdom is the non-cultivation of the cultivation of up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa'o //
translated: This cultivation of the perfection of wisdom is the non-cultivation of the applications of mindfulness.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa'o ;
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa'o ;
translated: This cultivation of the perfection of wisdom is the non-cultivation of the right efforts, legs of miraculous power, faculties, powers, limbs of awakening, and path.

original: /'di lta ste /
analyzed: /'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa'o //
translated: This cultivation of the perfection of wisdom is the non-cultivation of the immeasurables, concentrations, and formless absorptions.

original: 'di lta ste /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med @259a * //
analyzed: 'di lta ste / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med @259a * //

analyzed: pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa'o //

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'du byed bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa'o // 'di lta ste /

translated: This is the non-cultivation of the cultivation of existence.

analyzed: 'di ni skye ba bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa'o //
translated: This is the non-cultivation of the cultivation of birth.

original: 'di lta ste rgas pa dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa'o //🔽'di lta ste /
