translated: It is the non-cultivation of the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom which is the non-cultivation of the cultivation of the applications of mindfulness.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa'o //🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa'o // 'di lta ste /
translated: It is the non-cultivation of the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom which is the non-cultivation of the cultivation of the right efforts, the legs of miraculous power, the faculties, the powers, the branches of enlightenment, and the path.🔽It is the non-cultivation of the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom which is the non-cultivation of the cultivation of the ten powers, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges, the eighteen distinctive qualities of a Buddha, and great love.🔽It is the non-cultivation of the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom which is the non-cultivation of the cultivation of the perfection of giving.🔽It is the non-cultivation of the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom which is the non-cultivation of the cultivation of the perfection of morality, patience, perseverance, concentration, and wisdom.🔽It is the non-cultivation of the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom which is the non-cultivation of the cultivation of the emptinesses.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni stong pa nyid thams cad bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa'o //🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni stong pa nyid thams cad bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa'o // 'di lta ste /
translated: It is the non-cultivation of the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom which is the non-cultivation of the cultivation of the trances.🔽It is the non-cultivation of the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom which is the non-cultivation of the cultivation of the formless attainments.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa'o //🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa'o //🔽'di lta ste /
translated: It is the non-cultivation of the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom which is the non-cultivation of the cultivation of the applications of mindfulness.🔽It is the non-cultivation of the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom which is the non-cultivation of the cultivation of the right efforts, the legs of miraculous power, the faculties, the powers, the branches of enlightenment, and the path.🔽It is the non-cultivation of the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom which is the non-cultivation of the cultivation of the ten powers, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges, the eighteen distinctive qualities of a Buddha, and great love.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa'o //
translated: This cultivation of the perfection of wisdom is not the cultivation of the immeasurables, the concentrations, or the formless absorptions.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: This cultivation of the perfection of wisdom is not the cultivation of the noble truths, the superknowledges, emptiness, signlessness, wishlessness, the liberations, the meditative stabilizations,

original: snyoms par 'jug pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa'o //
translated: the dhāraṇī gateways, or the emptiness of internal phenomena.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa'o //
translated: This cultivation of the perfection of wisdom is not the cultivation of the ten powers, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges, or the distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa'o zhes bya ba ni mi dmigs pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no //🔽rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom pa rnam par mi bsgom pa'o zhes bya ba ni mi dmigs pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no // rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya ste /
translated: This cultivation of the perfection of wisdom is the non-cultivation of all aspects up to the knowledge of all aspects. This is the nature of non-apprehension.🔽Subhūti, this profound perfection of wisdom should be investigated by irreversible bodhisattva great beings.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ga' zhig gis gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par zhen par mi byed pa de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por yongs su brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ga' zhig gis gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par zhen par mi byed pa de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por yongs su brtag par bya'o //
translated: Any bodhisattva great being who does not settle down on this profound perfection of wisdom should be investigated as an irreversible bodhisattva great being.

original: de bzhin du byang @260b chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du byang @260b chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: In the same way, Subhūti, you should know that a bodhisattva great being who does not settle down on the perfection of concentration, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of patience, the perfection of morality,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen par mi byed pa de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por yongs su brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen par mi byed pa de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por yongs su brtag par bya'o //
translated: and the perfection of generosity is a bodhisattva great being who is irreversible.

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig gis gang nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mngon par zhen par mi byed pa dang / de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la mngon par zhen par mi byed pa dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig gis gang nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mngon par zhen par mi byed pa dang / de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la mngon par zhen par mi byed pa dang /
translated: In the same way, Subhūti, you should know that a bodhisattva great being who does not settle down on inner emptiness, up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature, and who does not settle down on the dharmas on the side of awakening,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par zhen par mi byed pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par zhen par mi byed pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /
translated: They do not settle down on the noble truths, the immeasurables, the dhyānas, or the formless absorptions. They do not settle down on the eight aspects of liberation, the nine serial steps of meditative absorption,

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la mngon par zhen par mi byed pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par zhen par mi byed pa dang /
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la mngon par zhen par mi byed pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par zhen par mi byed pa dang /
translated: the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness, the dhāraṇī gateways, and the higher knowledges.

original: stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mngon par zhen par mi byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mngon par zhes par mi byed pa de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'o //
analyzed: stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mngon par zhen par mi byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mngon par zhes par mi byed pa de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'o //
translated: “Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom do not see any dharma that is a bodhisattva, or the word ‘bodhisattva,’ or the perfection of wisdom, or the word ‘perfection of wisdom,’ or a bodhisattva great being practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig gis gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe /🔽pha rol gyis smras pa dang / pha rol gyis bstan pa la snying po dang / mchog tu mi lta ba de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig gis gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe / pha rol gyis smras pa dang / pha rol gyis bstan pa la snying po dang / mchog tu mi lta ba de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'o //
translated: “Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom do not see any dharma that is a bodhisattva, or the word ‘bodhisattva,’ or the perfection of wisdom, or the word ‘perfection of wisdom,’ or a bodhisattva great being practicing the perfection of wisdom.🔽“Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom do not see any dharma that is a bodhisattva, or the word ‘bodhisattva,’ or the perfection of wisdom, or the word ‘perfection of wisdom,’ or a bodhisattva great being practicing the perfection of wisdom.🔽“Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom do not see any dharma that is a bodhisattva, or the word ‘bodhisattva,’ or the perfection of wisdom, or the word ‘perfection of wisdom,’ or a bodhisattva great being practicing the perfection of wisdom.🔽“Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom do not see any dharma that is a bodhisattva, or the word ‘bodhisattva,’ or the perfection of wisdom, or the word ‘perfection of wisdom,’ or a bodhisattva great being practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig gis gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig gis gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: “Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom do not see any dharma that is a bodhisattva, or the word ‘bodhisattva,’ or the perfection of

original: pha rol gyi dad pas mi 'gro na de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'o //
analyzed: pha rol gyi dad pas mi 'gro na de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'o //
translated: If they are not carried away by the faith of others, they are irreversible bodhisattva great beings.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig gis gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig gis gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: “If a bodhisattva great being, when practicing this deep perfection of wisdom,

original: 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pas 'phrog pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pas 'phrog pa ma yin /
translated: is not carried away by a thought of greed,

original: zhe sdang dang gti mug dang bcas pa'i @261a * //
analyzed: zhe sdang dang gti mug dang bcas pa'i @261a * //
translated: or by a thought of hatred,

original: sems bskyed pas 'phrog pa ma yin na /
analyzed: sems bskyed pas 'phrog pa ma yin na /
translated: or by a thought of confusion,

original: de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'o zhes yongs su brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'o zhes yongs su brtag par bya ste /
translated: they are irreversible bodhisattva great beings.

original: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ga' zhig gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa'i tshe /🔽mi dngang kun tu mi skrag kun du skrag pas zin par mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ga' zhig gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa'i tshe / mi dngang kun tu mi skrag kun du skrag pas zin par mi 'gyur la /
translated: “If any irreversible bodhisattva great beings, when this deep perfection of wisdom is being taught,🔽are not frightened, are not terrified, and do not become terrified,

original: zhum par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: zhum par mi 'gyur /
translated: are not cowed,

original: yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur zhing /
translated: they will not be discouraged,

original: de'i yid phyir phyogs par mi byed /
analyzed: de'i yid phyir phyogs par mi byed /
translated: and their minds will not turn back.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'bral bar mi byed par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyan par dga' la thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'bral bar mi byed par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyan par dga' la thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /
translated: They will delight in listening to the perfection of wisdom, and having heard it, they will take it up, bear it in mind, read it aloud, master it, properly pay attention to it,

original: de bzhin du nan tan byed na /
analyzed: de bzhin du nan tan byed na /
translated: and likewise practice it.🔽Subhūti, you should know that those irreversible bodhisattva great beings have also heard this deep perfection of wisdom

original: rab 'byor phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos la /🔽thos nas bzung /🔽bcangs / kun chub par byas /
analyzed: rab 'byor phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos la / thos nas bzung / bcangs / kun chub par byas /
translated: in the past,🔽and having heard it, they have taken it up,

original: bklags / tshul bzhin du yid la byas /
analyzed: bklags / tshul bzhin du yid la byas /
translated: borne it in mind, mastered it,🔽read it aloud, and properly paid attention to it.

original: de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byas par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byas par rig par bya'o //
translated: They have practiced it just as it is.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: de ni 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa'i tshe /🔽mi dngang kun du mi skrag / kun du skrag pas zin par mi 'gyur la zhum bar mi 'gyur zhing de'i yid phyir phyogs par mi byed cing slar ldog par mi 'gyur bar thos nas kyang gong nas gong du 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa'i tshe / mi dngang kun du mi skrag / kun du skrag pas zin par mi 'gyur la zhum bar mi 'gyur zhing de'i yid phyir phyogs par mi byed cing slar ldog par mi 'gyur bar thos nas kyang gong nas gong du 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang /
translated: It is because the irreversible bodhisattva great beings, when this deep perfection of wisdom is being taught,🔽do not tremble, feel frightened, or become terrified, do not become cowed or stolid, and do not turn away or reject it, but having heard it take it up, bear it in mind, read it aloud, master it, properly pay attention to it, and practice it just as it is taught.

original: klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni mngon par zhen pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no //
analyzed: klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni mngon par zhen pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no //
translated: This is the nature of not settling down.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe /
translated: “Lord, when bodhisattva great beings are taught this deep perfection of wisdom,

original: mi dngang kun du mi skrag / kun du skrag pas zin par mi 'gyur zhing zhum par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: mi dngang kun du mi skrag / kun du skrag pas zin par mi 'gyur zhing zhum par mi 'gyur /
translated: not frightened, not afraid, not terrified, not trembling with fear,🔽not cowed,

original: yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur /🔽de'i yid phyir phyogs par mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur / de'i yid phyir phyogs par mi 'gyur na /
translated: not regretful,

original: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la ji ltar brtag par bgyi /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la ji ltar brtag par bgyi /
translated: Blessed One, how should a bodhisattva great being investigate this deep perfection of wisdom?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One replied,

original: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid @261b la gzhol ba'i bsam pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid @261b la gzhol ba'i bsam pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brtag par bya'o //
translated: “Subhūti, a bodhisattva great being should investigate this deep perfection of wisdom with a thought that is focused on the knowledge of all aspects.”

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti then asked,🔽“Blessed One, how should a bodhisattva great being investigate this deep perfection of wisdom?”

original: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa lags /🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /🔽rab 'byor stong pa nyid la gzhol ba dang / stong pa nyid la 'bab pa dang / stong pa nyid la nus pa'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor stong pa nyid la gzhol ba dang / stong pa nyid la 'bab pa dang / stong pa nyid la nus pa'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin /
translated: “Lord, how do bodhisattva great beings with a thought intent on the knowledge of all aspects investigate this deep perfection of wisdom?”🔽The Lord said, “Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings with a thought intent on emptiness, intent on emptiness, and able to be intent on emptiness investigate this deep perfection of wisdom.🔽Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings with a thought intent on signlessness, intent on signlessness, and able to be intent on signlessness investigate this deep perfection of wisdom.

original: rab 'byor mtshan ma med pa la gzhol ba dang / mtshan ma med pa la 'bab pa dang / mtshan ma med pa la nus pa'i bsam pa dang / rab 'byor smon pa med pa la gzhol ba dang / smon pa med pa la 'bab pa dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor mtshan ma med pa la gzhol ba dang / mtshan ma med pa la 'bab pa dang / mtshan ma med pa la nus pa'i bsam pa dang / rab 'byor smon pa med pa la gzhol ba dang / smon pa med pa la 'bab pa dang /
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings with a thought intent on wishlessness, intent on wishlessness, and able to be intent on wishlessness investigate this deep perfection of wisdom.

original: smon pa med pa la nus pa'i bsam pa dang / rab 'byor nam mkha' la gzhol ba dang / nam mkha' la 'bab pa dang / nam mkha' la nus pa'i bsam pa dang / rab 'byor yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar la gzhol ba dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'bab pa dang /
analyzed: smon pa med pa la nus pa'i bsam pa dang / rab 'byor nam mkha' la gzhol ba dang / nam mkha' la 'bab pa dang / nam mkha' la nus pa'i bsam pa dang / rab 'byor yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar la gzhol ba dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' la 'bab pa dang /
translated: the thought of being able in the absence of wishes,🔽the thought of being able in space, Subhūti,🔽the thought of being able in the very limit of reality,

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' la nus pa'i bsam pa dang / rab 'byor mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gzhol ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la 'bab pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la nus pa'i bsam pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' la nus pa'i bsam pa dang / rab 'byor mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gzhol ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la 'bab pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la nus pa'i bsam pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin /
translated: and the thought of being able in the unconditioned, Subhūti, are thoughts that speculate about this deep perfection of wisdom.

original: rab 'byor rmi lam la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / sprul pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / sgyu ma la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / smig rgyu la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / sgra brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / mig yor la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor rmi lam la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / sprul pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / sgyu ma la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / smig rgyu la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / sgra brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / mig yor la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang /
translated: Subhūti, they are those who are intent on dreams, intent on emanations, intent on illusions, intent on mirages, intent on echoes, intent on optical aberrations,

original: gzugs brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / dri za'i grong khyer la gzhol ba'i bsam pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin no /🔽// / bam po bzhi bcu brgyad pa /
analyzed: gzugs brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang / dri za'i grong khyer la gzhol ba'i bsam pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin no / // / bam po bzhi bcu brgyad pa /
translated: intent on reflections, and intent on cities of gandharvas.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti said,🔽“Lord, those who are intent on the profound perfection of wisdom are intent on what?”

original: bcom ldan 'das de ltar stong pa nyid la gzhol ba dang / stong pa nyid la 'bab pa dang / stong pa nyid la nus pa'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur zhing de bzhin du mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de ltar stong pa nyid la gzhol ba dang / stong pa nyid la 'bab pa dang / stong pa nyid la nus pa'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur zhing de bzhin du mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /
translated: Blessed One, in this way, with an attitude that is inclined toward emptiness, that is directed toward emptiness, and that is intent on emptiness, the bodhisattva great beings will understand this profound perfection of wisdom, and likewise, they will understand signlessness,

original: smon pa @262a * //
analyzed: smon pa @262a * //
translated: wishlessness,

original: ma mchis pa dang / nam mkha' dang / skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa dang / de bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang /
analyzed: ma mchis pa dang / nam mkha' dang / skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa dang / de bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang /
translated: space, nonproduction, noncessation, affliction, purification, suchness, the expanse of reality,

original: chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa dang / rmi lam dang / sprul pa dang / sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang /
analyzed: chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa dang / rmi lam dang / sprul pa dang / sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang /
translated: the reality of phenomena, the faultlessness of phenomena, the inconceivable, the limit of reality, the absence of mental activity, dreams, emanations, illusions, mirages,

original: sgra brnyan dang / mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan dang / dri za'i grong khyer la gzhol ba dang / 'bab pa dang / nus pa'i bsam pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur na /
analyzed: sgra brnyan dang / mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan dang / dri za'i grong khyer la gzhol ba dang / 'bab pa dang / nus pa'i bsam pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur na /
translated: echoes, optical illusions, reflections, and the cities of gandharvas, and they are able to contemplate this profound transcendent perfection of wisdom.

original: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs la yang rtog pa lags sam /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs la yang rtog pa lags sam /
translated: Blessed One, do great bodhisattva beings also contemplate physical forms?

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam /
translated: Do they contemplate feelings, perceptions, formative predispositions, and consciousness?

original: de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag rnams la rtog pa lags sam /
analyzed: de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag rnams la rtog pa lags sam /
translated: Are they concepts about the aggregates, elements, sense spheres, and the links of dependent origination?

original: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rtog pa lags sam /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rtog pa lags sam /
translated: Are they concepts about all the perfections, all the emptinesses, the liberations, the meditative stabilizations, and the dhāraṇī gateways?

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la rtog pa lags sam /
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la rtog pa lags sam /
translated: Are they concepts about the dharmas on the side of awakening?

original: tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam /
analyzed: tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam /
translated: Are they concepts about the immeasurables, the concentrations, the formless absorptions, emptiness, signlessness, wishlessness, and the clairvoyances?

original: stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam /
analyzed: stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam /
translated: Are they concepts about the powers, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges, and the distinct attributes of a buddha?

original: ci yang bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la rtog pa lags sam /🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: ci yang bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la rtog pa lags sam / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: “Is it the case, Bhagavān, that the bodhisattva mahāsattvas have concepts even with regard to the knowledge of all aspects?”

original: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gzugs la rtog pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gzugs la rtog pa ma yin no //
translated: The Bhagavān said, “Subhūti, bodhisattva mahāsattvas do not have concepts even with regard to form.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no //
translated: They do not have concepts even with regard to feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness.

original: phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag la rtog pa ma yin no //
analyzed: phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag la rtog pa ma yin no //
translated: They do not have concepts even with regard to the aggregates, constituents, sense fields, dependent origination, or the links of dependent origination.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid @262b thams cad la rtog pa ma yin no //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid @262b thams cad la rtog pa ma yin no //
translated: They do not have concepts even with regard to all the perfections, all the emptinesses,

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la rtog pa ma yin no //
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la rtog pa ma yin no //
translated: or the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening.

original: tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no //
analyzed: tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no //
translated: the concentrations, the formless absorptions, or the noble truths;

original: rnam par thar pa dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rtog pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rtog pa ma yin no //
translated: they do not conceptualize the gateways to liberation, the concentrations, or the dhāraṇī gateways;

original: stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no //
analyzed: stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no //
translated: and they do not conceptualize the ten powers, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges, or the distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la rtog pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la rtog pa ma yin no //
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings do not conceptualize the knowledge of all aspects up to the knowledge of path aspects.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor 'di ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sus kyang ma byas /🔽gang nas kyang ma 'ongs /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sus kyang ma byas / gang nas kyang ma 'ongs /
translated: Subhūti, it is because the knowledge of all aspects is not made by anyone,🔽does not come from anywhere,

original: gang du yang ma song /🔽gang na yang mi gnas /
analyzed: gang du yang ma song / gang na yang mi gnas /
translated: does not go anywhere,🔽does not stay anywhere,

original: yul na yang mi gnas /
analyzed: yul na yang mi gnas /
translated: and does not abide anywhere.

original: phyogs na yang mi gnas te /
analyzed: phyogs na yang mi gnas te /
translated: It does not abide in any direction.

original: de la grangs mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de la grangs mi dmigs so //
translated: It is not perceived in terms of number.

original: 'gro ba dang 'ong ba mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'gro ba dang 'ong ba mi dmigs so //
translated: It is not perceived in terms of coming and going.

original: gang la grangs mi dmigs shing /
analyzed: gang la grangs mi dmigs shing /
translated: That which is not perceived in terms of number

original: 'gro ba dang 'ong ba mi dmigs pa de ni gang gis kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus te /
analyzed: 'gro ba dang 'ong ba mi dmigs pa de ni gang gis kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus te /
translated: and is not perceived in terms of coming and going cannot be fully awakened into buddhahood by anything at all.

original: gzugs kyis ma yin /🔽tshor bas ma yin /
analyzed: gzugs kyis ma yin / tshor bas ma yin /
translated: It cannot be fully awakened into buddhahood by form.🔽It cannot be fully awakened into buddhahood by feeling.

original: 'du shes kyis ma yin /
analyzed: 'du shes kyis ma yin /
translated: It cannot be fully awakened into buddhahood by perception.

original: 'du byed rnams kyis ma yin /
analyzed: 'du byed rnams kyis ma yin /
translated: It cannot be fully awakened into buddhahood by volitional factors.

original: rnam par shes pas ma yin /🔽phung pos ma yin /🔽khams kyis ma yin /
analyzed: rnam par shes pas ma yin / phung pos ma yin / khams kyis ma yin /
translated: It cannot be fully awakened into buddhahood by consciousness.🔽It cannot be fully awakened into buddhahood by the aggregates.🔽It cannot be fully awakened into buddhahood by the constituents.

original: skye mched rnams kyis ma yin /🔽rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bas ma yin /
analyzed: skye mched rnams kyis ma yin / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bas ma yin /
translated: It cannot be fully awakened into buddhahood by the sense fields.🔽It cannot be fully awakened into buddhahood by dependent origination.

original: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag gis ma yin no //
analyzed: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag gis ma yin no //
translated: It cannot be fully awakened into buddhahood by the factors of dependent origination.

original: sbyin bas ma yin /
analyzed: sbyin bas ma yin /
translated: It cannot be fully awakened into buddhahood by generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyis ma yin /🔽bzod pas ma yin /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyis ma yin / bzod pas ma yin /
translated: It cannot be fully awakened into buddhahood by ethical discipline.🔽It cannot be fully awakened into buddhahood by patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyis ma yin /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyis ma yin /
translated: It cannot be fully awakened into buddhahood by perseverance.

original: bsam gtan gyis ma yin ;
analyzed: bsam gtan gyis ma yin ;
translated: It cannot be fully awakened into buddhahood by concentration.

original: shes rab kyis ma yin /
analyzed: shes rab kyis ma yin /
translated: It cannot be fully awakened into buddhahood by wisdom.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi bar gyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi bar gyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ma yin no //
translated: up to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gzugs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams nyid dang / rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: gzugs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams nyid dang / rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: Form itself is the knowledge of all aspects, and feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness itself is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: Up to the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / sangs @263a * //
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / sangs @263a * //
translated: Why is that?

original: rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste /
analyzed: rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste /
translated: It is because the suchness of form, the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects, and the suchness of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are one suchness.

original: gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do //
translated: That suchness is not two and cannot be divided into two.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste /
translated: The suchness of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness, the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects, and the suchness of the buddhadharmas are one suchness.

original: gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do //
translated: They are not two, nor are they divided, nor are they otherwise.

original: phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag rnams kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag rnams kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
translated: The suchness of the aggregates, the suchness of the constituents, the suchness of the sense fields, the suchness of dependent origination, the suchness of the members of dependent origination, the suchness of the noble truths,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste /
translated: The suchness of the knowledge of all aspects and the suchness of the buddhadharmas are one suchness.

original: gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do //
translated: They are not two, nor divided, nor broken apart.

original: de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / stong pas nyid rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / tshad med pa dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / stong pas nyid rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / tshad med pa dang /
translated: Similarly, the suchness of the perfections, the suchness of the emptinesses, the suchness of the factors of awakening, the suchness of the immeasurables,

original: bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
translated: the suchness of the concentrations, the formless absorptions, the meditative stabilizations, and the absorptions, the suchness of the dhāraṇī gateways, the suchness of the liberations,

original: mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
translated: the suchness of the four detailed and thorough knowledges,🔽the suchness of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,🔽the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste /
translated: and the suchness of the buddhadharmas is one suchness.

original: gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do //
translated: It is not two, nor is it divided.

original: de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog autpala dang / ku mu da dang / punda r'i ka dang / soo gandhi ka dang /
analyzed: de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog autpala dang / ku mu da dang / punda r'i ka dang / soo gandhi ka dang /
translated: Then the gods in the desire realm and the gods in the form realm scattered divine sandalwood powder and divine flowers—utpala, kumuda, puṇḍarīka, and so on—and divine garments over the Lord, and they said to the Lord, “Lord, it is just as you have said.

original: man d'a ra ba dang / man d'a ra ba chen po mang po thogs te bcom ldan 'das ga la @263b ba der gtor to //
analyzed: man d'a ra ba dang / man d'a ra ba chen po mang po thogs te bcom ldan 'das ga la @263b ba der gtor to //
translated: They scattered many mandārava flowers and great mandārava flowers toward the Blessed One.

original: gtor nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste /
analyzed: gtor nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste /
translated: Having scattered them, they approached the Blessed One.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
translated: They bowed their heads at the Blessed One’s feet and sat to one side.

original: 'khod nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //🔽bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab cing blta dka' ba /
analyzed: 'khod nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab cing blta dka' ba /
translated: While sitting there, the gods of the desire realm and the gods of the form realm said to the Blessed One,

original: rtogs par dka' ba /
analyzed: rtogs par dka' ba /
translated: “Blessed One, the perfection of wisdom is profound, difficult to see, difficult to understand,

original: brtag tu ma mchis pa /
analyzed: brtag tu ma mchis pa /
translated: not something to be investigated,

original: rtog ge'i spyod yul ma lags pa /
analyzed: rtog ge'i spyod yul ma lags pa /
translated: not the sphere of sophistry,

original: zhi ba / phra ba /
analyzed: zhi ba / phra ba /
translated: peaceful, subtle,

original: mdzangs pa / mkhas pa /
analyzed: mdzangs pa / mkhas pa /
translated: wise, and intelligent.

original: rnam par shes pas rig par bgyi ba /
analyzed: rnam par shes pas rig par bgyi ba /
translated: It is to be known by the wise,

original: 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa 'di lta ste /
translated: and it is not in accord with the whole world, as follows:

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub ces bgyi ba gang du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar zab pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub ces bgyi ba gang du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar zab pa /
translated: “The enlightenment of the tathāgatas” is where the tathāgatas, arhats, genuinely perfect buddhas have revealed this transcendent perfection of wisdom, which is so profound,🔽and which is so subtle.

original: 'di ltar phra ba bstan pa ni gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar phra ba bstan pa ni gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: Form itself is omniscience,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so //
translated: and omniscience itself is form.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: Sensation, perception, and formative predispositions, and consciousness itself is omniscience,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o //🔽de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: and omniscience itself is consciousness.

original: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste /
analyzed: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste /
translated: If you ask why, it is because the real nature of form and the real nature of omniscience are a single real nature.

original: gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //
analyzed: gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //
translated: They are not two, nor are they divided.

original: tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / 'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste /

translated: The suchness of feeling, the suchness of perception, the suchness of volitional factors, and the suchness of consciousness, and the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects are one suchness.

original: gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //
analyzed: gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //

analyzed: de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o //

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste /
translated: The suchness of the aggregates, elements, sense-spheres, and dependent origination, and the suchness of omniscience are one suchness.

original: gnyis su ma @264a * //
analyzed: gnyis su ma @264a * //
translated: It is not two,

original: mchis shing gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so //

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste /
translated: The suchness of the Blessed Buddhas and the suchness of omniscience are one suchness.

original: gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so zhes bgyi ba'o //
analyzed: gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so zhes bgyi ba'o //
translated: It is not two, nor can it be divided.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: Then the Blessed One said to those gods of the desire realm and the form realm:

original: lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no //
analyzed: lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no //
translated: “Gods, it is so!

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /

original: lha'i bu dag gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de /

analyzed: lha'i bu dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so //

original: lha'i bu dag tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de lha'i bu dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o //

translated: Divine princes, feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness itself are the knowledge of all aspects. Divine princes, the knowledge of all aspects is also consciousness.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste /
analyzed: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste /

original: gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do //

analyzed: gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do //
translated: They are not two, nor are they divided, nor are they otherwise.

translated: The suchness of the aggregates, elements, sense-spheres, and dependent origination, and the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects are one suchness.

original: gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do //
translated: They are not two, nor are they divided.

original: lha'i bu dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //

original: lha'i bu dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: lha'i bu dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste /
translated: The suchness of the perfection of giving and the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects are one suchness.

original: gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do //🔽de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do // de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
translated: They are not two but indivisible.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste /
translated: Similarly, the suchness of the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom and the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects are one suchness.

original: gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do //
translated: They are not two but indivisible.”

original: nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: The emptiness of internal phenomena is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the emptiness of internal phenomena.

original: de bzhin du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: In the same way, the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities is the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do //
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste /
translated: The suchness of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities and the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects are a single suchness.

original: gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do //🔽dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: They are not two, nor are they divided.🔽The applications of mindfulness are the knowledge of all aspects.

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o //

original: de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: Similarly, the right efforts, legs of miraculous power, faculties, powers, limbs of awakening, and path are the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba dang ; rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam mo //

translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the right efforts, legs of miraculous power, faculties, powers, limbs of awakening, and path.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste /🔽gnyis su med cing @265a * //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste / gnyis su med cing @265a * //
translated: The suchness of the applications of mindfulness and the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects are one suchness.

original: gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med do //
translated: They are not two but indivisible.

original: de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste /
translated: Likewise, the suchness of the correct exertions, the bases of supernatural power, the faculties, the powers, the branches of awakening, and the path, and the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects is one suchness.

original: gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do //🔽tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do // tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: It is not two or divided.🔽The immeasurables, the concentrations, and the formless absorptions are the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
translated: The knowledge of all aspects is the immeasurables, the concentrations, and the formless absorptions.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste /
analyzed: tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste /
translated: the concentrations, and the formless absorptions, and the suchness of the knowledge of all aspects are one suchness.

original: gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do //
translated: They are not two, nor are they divided, nor are they otherwise.🔽Similarly, the noble truths, emptiness, signlessness,

original: de bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang /

analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
translated: the dhāraṇī gateways, the ten powers, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges, and the distinct attributes of a buddha are the knowledge of all aspects.

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so //
